more description: Unit has been fully remodeled, fresh paint, new kitchen, new bathroom, new tiles, building with private yard and security cameras, free parking, Smart TV with free Netflix. Memory foam mattresses in both bedroom and living room sleeper sofa. Tropical landscape in the backyard and grill.  The apt is within walking distance of Young Circle with Hollywood Downtown nearby restaurants and nightlife. It is located about 2.5 miles from the beautiful Hollywood Beach and the best Boardwalk in South FL.The spaceThe one bedroom has a great set up, plenty of space and it is fully equipped with all the necessities.  Small appliances and dishwasher for the kitchen.  Large bathroom with tub and a comfortable bedroom with a very spacious closet. It was fully updated with new stainless steel appliances and new AC units.  You can enjoy a full dining table inside as well as a patio dining table with a grill, pergola and lounges outside.  It has a comfortable queen size bed, memory foam mattress, all Egyptian cotton soft sheets, a dresser with mirror, a coffee nook in the bedroom and plenty of storage space.   There is also a queen size memory foam mattress sleeper sofa in the living room as well as a twin size memory foam sleeper sofa.  If you need baby items don't hesitate to ask.

more description: Fully remodeled and designer furnished 1 BR, 1 Bath apartment with garden positioned between Hollywood Beach and downtownThis clean, fully-remodeled 1 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment with patio is located in the heart of Hollywood. Perfect for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers, this charming art getaway with private entrance and AC offers relaxation and open spaces. It’s close to the beach, the stunning broadwalk, Stranahan River, top restaurants, pubs and shops.The spaceBEDROOMS:The apartment sleeps up to 2 guests. Its beach-themed bedroom with comfortable queen bed and luxury linens is the perfect place to read and rest after a long day in the sun. BATHROOM:There is one bathroom in the apartment, complete with toilet, sink, and combo: shower/tub. Get ready for a day out on Hollywood Beach, and wash away the sand and sunscreen at the end of the day.We provide freshly laundered towels, soap, shampoo and toilet paper.KITCHEN:The tasteful, fully-stocked kitchen has everything you need to prepare delicious meals, including an electric stove, oven, fridge, microwave, coffee maker and a toaster. We provide cooking basics, pots and pans, dishes and silverware. Sit at the dining table with your morning coffee and make plans for the day.LIVING ROOM:The apartment’s cozy living room features a comfortable sofa, warm lighting and modern decor. Curl up with your holiday read, or switch on the flat-screen 42” HDTV for a night in. Cable and high-speed WiFi included.OUTSIDE SPACE:The  backyard with private patio is a great place for relaxing. Sip iced tea at the outdoor dining table and listen to the seagulls. Enjoy our Hollywood oasis.★☆ Book Today & Let Us Take Care Of You In Hollywood! ☆★A Coin laundry with washer and dryer is behind the house on the property Private parking for 1 car.This apartment is part of a house with 3 units if you are interested in renting more units, please contact meNO CABLE TV. Free STREAMING TV: LIVE CHANNELS WITH PEACKOCK PREMIUM AND PLUTO TV.ONLY 1 SMALL DOG ALLOWED: LESS THAN 20 LBplease include the dog in the reservation AND A PET FEE WILL APPLYIF YOU HAVE a BIG DOG CONTACT ME BEFORE RESERVING

more description: Our one bedroom house has been newly remodeled and furnished. It is very posh. The living room has a comfortable couch and a 60 inch smart TV (connect your Netflix, Prime Video, HBO etc. accounts) that will keep you entertained. The bedroom has two queen size beds and another 50" smart TV as well. The Xfinity 400 Mbps high speed internet will keep everything streaming smoothly and give you a great internet connection to work from home when needed. The house is a short 8 minute drive from Hollywood Beach and boardwalk.The spaceThe bedroom has two queen size beds, night stands with usb's and a mounted smart tv to watch before bed. There is a comfortable couch in the living room. The house can sleep 4 people. The kitchenette is fully stocked including a refrigerator, microwave, sink, toaster, coffee maker and kettle.

more description: BEACH, POOL AND BOARDWALK OPEN!!!Cozy ocean front studio on the beach. This privately owned studio is in beachfront residency/hotel called Historic Hollywood Beach  Resort, so you get the benefit of a quiet apartment with hotel amenities. We are located on the famous Hollywood Boardwalk. Walk to Margaritaville,  boardwalk shops, bars, restaurants, bike rentals, café, smoothie shops, & nightlife, but just far enough to be peaceful at night.PAID  PARKING NO SMOKING -$250 SMOKING FINEThe spaceThe hotel front desk is at your service, as well as a pool, a laundry room, and a paid parking garage.A white sand beach is just steps away with volleyball nets and life guards. Relax at the beach or lounge by the hotel pool and sundeck with a margarita in hand!The studio has a king size bed with a comfortable mattress, updated bathroom and shower, small kitchen with microwave, oven/stove and silverware, WiFi, cable, AC, and all towels and linens will be provided. We will also provide you with soap, shampoo, and toilet paper. however please note these will not be refilled during your stay.Note paid parking options are available, see details in “Other Things to Note” section

more description: This studio is perfect for two with a queen size bed, fully equipped kitchen, full bath, and a Roku T.V so that you may log on to all of your favorite streaming services.. The Studio is located in our newly renovated adults only boutique hotel. We are centrally located in the heart of Hollywood.The spaceGuests are available to use everything inside the home.★ Important★This is an ADULTS ONLY boutique hotel. Kids are not allowed on the grounds. If our staff notify us of any children you will be removed from the property immediately and Airbnb will be contacted so that they cancel your booking immediately with no refund. Currently the pool onsite is NOT available to the public for safety reasons as we are in the process of installing a heating feature. If you are found in the pool you will be removed from the property and Airbnb will be contacted so that they cancel your booking immediately with no refund. We are working hard so that our guests may enjoy our pool as soon as possible! All other outside features are available for our guests to enjoy. Other things to note:★ Amenities ★☑ A/C mini splits ☑ Free parking for one car☑ Fully equipped kitchen☑ 1 Smart Roku T.V - Must log on to your own streaming services☑ 2 towels☑ 2 face towels☑ 1 bath mat☑ 1 hand towels☑ 2 rolls of toilet paper☑ 2 Kitchen towels☑5 trash bags★ Our Tropical Climate ★☑ It can get really hot during the day. Bring sunscreen to protect your skin.☑ We live in a tropical climate so bugs and mosquitoes are common we recommend bringing bug repellent.☑ We constantly treat our homes. However please follow these instruction to prevent bugs from coming into our home:☑ Keep ALL doors and windows closed as much as possible.☑ Don't leave any food or sweets out.☑ Keep the home as clean as possible during your stay.★ Maintenance ★☑ Please throw trash away in the garbage bins located at the front of the home.☑ Please do not have the A/C on with doors/ windows open as this can cause severe damage to the homes. Our cleaners ensure all windows are closed upon arrival and video document it. Any damage to the A/C will be billed to guest via Airbnb resolution center w/ proof from plumber.☑ Please do not flush anything other than toilet paper down the toilet as this can cause clogs to the pipes due to the homes age. Plumbing fees will be charged via resolution center w/ proof from plumber.☑ Landscapers come every two weeks to cut the grass.

number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in November 2012**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: This is an older unit (really needs updating) in a complex of ten units surrounding a large backyard. NO KITCHEN.Pool: shared, heated year round, 20x40’ (6x12m), very deepGrill: private gas grill & patioSmartTV: log on to your Netflix/HBO/etc accountKitchen: NONE Wifi: redundant high speed connectionsParking: free, off-street, two carsAlso: crib, beach gearThe spaceThe pool and deck are very large and are shared by all ten units.  Swim or just relax in the sun!  It is heated to 82 degrees year round.  The salt water is very mild. It has no chlorine or harsh chemicals.  It doesn't sting your eyes, and it leaves your skin feeling soft and smooth. All ten units share the large common backyard, which is entirely fenced in, creating a private vacation compound.  Kids can run around freely with minimal supervision. The pool is protected by a child-resistant gate.Beach gear: we provide beach towels, beach chairs, umbrellas, and a cooler.Wi-Fi: two internet connections (AT&T and Comcast) provide redundancy. Both are the highest residential speed available.  Wifi is strong throughout the entire property, even in the yard, the pool, and the laundry room.  Stream 4K movies or do video calls.Office desk & chair: work from home using the full-size office desk and reclining office chair with high back.Cooking: there is no kitchen.  The only sink is in the bathroom.  There is a microwave, coffee maker, and mini-fridge.  Babies: every unit has a Pack n Play CribLaundry: you'll have access to the laundry room, shared by all ten units.  There are two washers and two dryers, and they are coin operated.Coffee: Keurig, and we provide the first 4 podsNearby:  a 24-hour convenience store, a gas station, several restaurants, and a large park are all within walking distance.

more description: New construction Villa in the heart of Hollywood that's ideal for a peaceful vacation or getaway.Inside, you can also enjoy a very spacious living room with a Smart TV, an Air Hockey table, a dining table, a kitchen and more.The backyard has everything you ever dream of: a heated pool, an amazing Fire Pit, a Mini Golf course and a terrace with a Ping Pong table and dining table (with a grill).The unique design of this Jungle Villa will make feel the luxury Miami life and vibes.The spaceBEDROOMS:1. Master Bedroom with a KING SIZE BED, a 60" Smart TV and access to a full private bathroom.2. Bedroom with a KING SIZE BED, a 60" Smart TV and access to a full private bathroom.3. Bedroom with TWO QUEEN SIZE BEDS and access to a full private bathroom.4. Bedroom with a QUEEN SIZE BED, a Smart TV and access to shared full bathroom.5. Bedroom with a QUEEN SIZE BED, a Smart TV and access to shared full bathroom.*Two extra folding beds.All the bathrooms are stocked with the toiletries our guests will need, also towels are included.THE VILLA HAS AN OUTDOOR CAMERA TO CONTROL WHO GOES IN AND OUT, ALWAYS LOOKING FOR OUR GUEST SAFETY.The property is professionally cleaned and sanitized following the CDC guidelines and inspected before every stay by our team to make your stay perfect.

more description: Hyde Resort & Residences in Hollywood, reimagines the modern beach retreat. Guests of our oceanfront oasis enjoy a breezy elevated sundeck overlooking the Atlantic Ocean (with private cabanas and an infinity pool) and a Fitness Center with cardio theater, yoga. Valet Parking (Variable) and resort fee ($40 a day plus tax) is not included, must be paid during your stay. Beach chairs and umbrellas are available for rent. Daily cleaning is not included. You must be 21 or older to rent.The spacePerfect for a family getaway, suites mix natural wood and stone with organic textures and state-of-the-art technology. Highlights include floor-to-ceiling sliding glass doors to private furnished terraces, fully equipped kitchens with stainless appliances and granite counters, and in-suite washers/dryers. Stylish and elegant retreats with spectacular ocean views, decorated in soft earth tones accented with modern furnishings. Wall-mounted LED “smart” televisions anchor open floor-plan living areas finished with atmospheric lighting and contemporary European designer furniture

number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in November 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Fully remodeled and designer furnished 1 BR, 1 Bath apartment with garden positioned between Hollywood Beach and downtownThis clean, fully-remodeled 1 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment with patio is located in the heart of Hollywood. Perfect for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers, this charming art getaway with private entrance and AC offers relaxation and open spaces. It’s close to the beach, the stunning broadwalk, Stranahan River, top restaurants, pubs and shops.The spaceBEDROOMS:The apartment sleeps up to 2 guests. Its beach-themed bedroom with comfortable queen bed and luxury linens is the perfect place to read and rest after a long day in the sun. BATHROOM:There is one bathroom in the apartment, complete with toilet, sink, and combo: shower/tub. Get ready for a day out on Hollywood Beach, and wash away the sand and sunscreen at the end of the day.We provide freshly laundered towels, soap, shampoo and toilet paper.KITCHEN:The tasteful, fully-stocked kitchen has everything you need to prepare delicious meals, including an electric stove, oven, fridge, microwave, coffee maker and a toaster. We provide cooking basics, pots and pans, dishes and silverware. Sit at the dining table with your morning coffee and make plans for the day.LIVING ROOM:The apartment’s cozy living room features a comfortable sofa, warm lighting and modern decor. Curl up with your holiday read, or switch on the flat-screen 42” HDTV for a night in. Cable and high-speed WiFi included.OUTSIDE SPACE:The  backyard with private patio is a great place for relaxing. Sip iced tea at the outdoor dining table and listen to the seagulls. Enjoy our Hollywood oasis.★☆ Book Today & Let Us Take Care Of You In Hollywood! ☆★A Coin laundry with washer and dryer is behind the house on the property Private parking for 1 car.This apartment is part of a house with 3 units if you are interested in renting more units, please contact meNO CABLE TV. Free STREAMING TV: LIVE CHANNELS WITH PEACKOCK PREMIUM AND PLUTO TV.ONLY 1 SMALL DOG ALLOWED: LESS THAN 20 LBplease include the dog in the reservation AND A PET FEE WILL APPLYIF YOU HAVE a BIG DOG CONTACT ME BEFORE RESERVING

more description: Welcome to a private beach condo in Hollywood Florida. It's easy to go full immersion in the Atlantic Ocean in this modern one-bedroom apt. Upon entry, you are greeted by floor to ceiling windows in the main living space overlooking the palm trees; a formal dining space that is connected to the main living space offers open concept living and entertaining. Dip in the heated pool or hot tub at the rooftop, and enjoy breakfast at the cafe on the first floor.The space- 1 bedroom, plus Den, 1 bathroom (950 sq. ft.)Beds distribution:- Room 1:  1 king size bed- Living room: 1 sofa bed (queen size)- Den: 1 sofa bed (queen size)- Very well stocked & equipped kitchen for cooking. (Cooking oil, salt & pepper is not provided)- Espresso machine. - High Speed Wi-Fi- 3 Smart TVs with access to Netflix, & other apps available to use with your own account- Check-in instructions will be provided an hour before check-in- Fresh towels, toiletries and linens- Iron, iron board & Hair Dryer

name: Apartment in Hollywood

number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in January 2020**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to The HYDE ResortHollywood's new hottest residential-style resort featuring beach-inspired amenities, and a prime location.Where we will make sure that this luxuries 2 bedroom penthouse will feel like your home away from home.Enjoy breathtaking views, wrap-around balconies, contemporary European furniture, fully equipped gourmet style kitchen, High-Speed WiFi, and much more.ATTENTION PLEASE!Kindly review and agree to everything described in "Other things to note"!The spaceThis superbly styled oceanfront apartment makes for a perfect luxurious getaway. Ideal for groups of friends & family looking for a high-end Florida location. Great for people looking for an extraordinary Airbnb experience. It even suits couples looking for luxurious “home away from home” or a romantic break!Highlights include contemporary European furniture, fully equipped gourmet style kitchen, High-Speed WiFi, and in-suite washers and dryers.Living Area:The main living space is professionally designed to be tasteful as well as comfortable for your stay. The open plan kitchen has everything you will need for your stay including a toaster, cooking pots, utensils and even a coffeemaker. From the kitchen island you look out to the living room/dinning are as well as beautiful views through panoramic floor to ceiling windows. The dining area has a table and four chairs. The dining area leads into the living area which has a comfortable couch along with a Smart TV that is perfect after a long day at the beach.Master Bedroom (Ocean view):The master bedroom has a king sized bed with high quality memory foam and ecologically produced bed linens and beautiful ocean views. The walk-in closet provides plenty of space to store all your clothes and the master bath has a separate shower and tub so that you don’t have to wait for your turn. This bedroom has flat screen TV.Second Bedroom (Ocean view):The 2nd bedroom has two full size beds and ocean view. This bedroom has flat screen TV as well. Plenty of closet space and own bathroom with shower.

number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in May 2015**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
Check our extended stay discounts. This is a luxury studio on the famous Hollywood Beach Boardwalk. Steps from MargaritaVille entertainment center. No need for a car, restaurants over the boardwalk, bike rentals, water sports. Netflix included. Enjoy the top floor pool overlooking the ocean. Fully equipped for your vacation. I am a local real estate broker, dedicated to successfully managing and offering investments to foreign nationals. I speak Portuguese, Spanish, and English.
Fees payable at check-in.
Registration fee of $40.
Check-in fee $15.
Building has valet parking only, overnight guests pay $37.10/day. If you are staying 14 days, it’s $280.75. If you are staying 30 days+, it will be $560.50. These prices include tax.
You will have to pay a $30 plus tax/night resort fee per room at check-in for rentals of less than 30 days. For more than 30 days, it's $15 plus tax/day.
This unit is privately owned and does not participate on the hotel program. No housekeeping or room service.
Property may include a noise alert monitoring system in order to ensure that neighborhood noise levels are respected. There is no electronic video or audio surveillance monitoring on the interior of the unit. Please be aware that any sound that crosses a property line at an unreasonable loud volume is unlawful within the city; as per the City Noise Ordinance, Chapter 100 of the Hollywood Code of Ordinance.
DPBR Florida License: CND1621085The spaceThe studio is located on the south tower. Same as the rooftop pool and bar.

Memory foam mattresses in both bedroom and living room sleeper sofa. Tropical landscape in the backyard and grill. It has a comfortable queen size bed, memory foam mattress, all Egyptian cotton soft sheets, a dresser with mirror, a coffee nook in the bedroom and plenty of storage space.   There is also a queen size memory foam mattress sleeper sofa in the living room as well as a twin size memory foam sleeper sofa.  If you need baby items don't hesitate to ask.

name: Condo in Hollywood
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Alina6 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in July 2013**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Spectacular 2 bedroom unit with the most amazing view. Look out over the ocean, bay  and the city! The apartment has a large terrace. Fully furnished, fully equipped kitchen. The unit has a nice spacious layout. The building is filled with  amenities including a fitness center, 2 big pools, an aquatic club, an outdoor theater, a tennis court, multi-use court. Beach club on the beach too! It is located in Hollywood just steps away from famous boardwalk.The spaceFrom spending the day swimming, sunning, and playing tennis on the 6th floor, to gathering under the stars for al fresco movies, dining, and drinks overlooking the ocean, guests will revel in the full Hyde Beach House experience. It gives all amenities of a famous location: a restaurant and bar with a poolside view, 24-hour security, a fitness center, tennis, racquetball, and basketball courts, beach club access, and an outdoor movie theater.     Rent monthly, daily, or weekly, inquire about daily and weekly ratesINTERIOR:Casual and elegant interior for families or small groups of friends. It is bright and cozy with a spectacular water view. Fully equipped kitchen with fridge, dishwasher, stove, and oven, all for cooking. 4-6 people can comfortably sit in the dining zone. The capacity of the terrace is 6-8 people. Two bedrooms have everything for comfortable rest: king-size beds, TV, working zone. EXTERIOR:Located on South Florida’s sun-kissed Atlantic Coast, Hollywood is home to internationally-inspired al fresco dining, the retro Hollywood Beach Bandshell, verdant golf courses, and of course, its ever-popular warm sandy beaches. Close to Aventura mall, Gulfstream racetrack and casino, Hard Rock Casino, and Hard Rock Stadium. Walmart for your grocery shopping, Restaurants, and more. The Big Easy Casino is just 11 minutes away. The Butterfly World is 35 minutes driving.Miami International Airport (35 minutes drive) and Ft Lauderdale International Airport (25 minutes drive).

more description: Welcome to The HYDE ResortHollywood's new hottest residential-style resort featuring beach-inspired amenities, and a prime location.Where we will make sure that this luxuries 2 bedroom/ 2 bathroom penthouse will feel like your home away from home.Enjoy breathtaking views, wrap-around balconies, contemporary European furniture, fully equipped gourmet style kitchen, High-Speed WiFi, and much more.ATTENTION PLEASE!Kindly review and agree to everything described in "Other things to note"!The spaceThis superbly styled oceanfront condo makes for a perfect luxurious getaway. Ideal for groups of friends & family looking for a high-end Florida location. Great for people looking for an extraordinary Airbnb experience. It even suits couples looking for luxurious “home away from home” or a romantic break!Highlights include contemporary European furniture, fully equipped gourmet style kitchen, High-Speed WiFi, and in-suite washers and dryers.Living Area:The main living space is professionally designed to be tasteful as well as comfortable for your stay. The open plan kitchen has everything you will need for your stay including a toaster, cooking pots, utensils and even a coffeemaker. From the kitchen island you look out to the living room/dinning are as well as beautiful views through panoramic floor to ceiling windows. The dining area has a table and four chairs. The dining area leads into the living area which has a comfortable couch along with a Smart TV that is perfect after a long day at the beach.Master Bedroom (Ocean view):The master bedroom has a king sized bed with high quality memory foam and ecologically produced bed linens and beautiful ocean views. The walk-in closet provides plenty of space to store all your clothes and the master bath has a separate shower  so that you don’t have to wait for your turn. This bedroom has flat screen TV.Second Bedroom (Ocean view):The 2nd bedroom has two double size beds and ocean view. This bedroom has flat screen TV as well. Plenty of closet space and own bathroom with shower.

number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in April 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
This comfortable and spacious 2 bedroom/2 bath casita is located in quiet, small community of just 7 units and beautiful foliage and greenery.  It’s cheery and welcoming interior invites you to begin your South Florida vacation in style! The kitchen is fully equipped with stainless steel appliances and plenty of cabinets. Enjoy fast WiFi and Sling streaming service. Both BRs w/ Smart TV. A large park is just across the street. The award-winning beach is just one mile away. Pets welcome w/fee.The spaceCasita Calima’s generous living space is cool and comfortable, in shades of gray and white, with pops of greenery throughout. The living room offers plank floors and seating for 4-5, with a sofa and occasional chairs. You’ll love the modern, welcoming vibe in this relaxing space. 

The family chef will be very pleased with this updated and fully equipped kitchen! Enjoy the stainless steel appliances and quartz counters as you whip up the family’s favorite meals and snacks. As a separate space, the kitchen can be solely the chef’s domain. But everyone better come running when dinner’s ready - and you can dine together at the table for 4 in the formal dining space 

Romance is in the air in the master bedroom, with its king size canopy bed. Additional features here include lovely abstract art, a generous closet and flat-screen TV for your late-night binge-watching. The en-suite bath offers a modern vanity and walk-in shower. 

The guest bedroom is perfect for another couple or two small children with a double bed, tall dresser, and flat-screen TV. The guest bath has a pedestal sink and a tub/shower. 

At Casita Calima, you are conveniently located halfway between Miami and Fort Lauderdale with easy access to both exciting and diverse cities. 

The Fort Lauderdale airport (FLL) is just 10 minutes away, which is a convenient relief after a long day of travel. 

On your way to check-in, drop by the new Hard Rock, also just 10 minutes from Casita Calima for a bite to eat. Maybe you’ll spot a celebrity! 

It’s so easy to walk everywhere. Within a 4-block radius, you’ll find restaurants, coffee shops, bars and a grocery store. Park your car and get your steps in every day. 

This property is dog-friendly with an additional $250 fee per pet. Please let us know if you will be bringing your dog. (only dogs are permitted, sorry)

We look forward to welcoming you to Casita Calima and Hollywood, FL!

more description: Steps from the HOLLYWOOD BOARDWALK overlooking a beautiful beach surrounded by bars, live music events, and wonderful restaurants - All at walking distance. This MODERN CONDO RESORT with a ROOFTOP POOL, Hot Tub, Gym and Sun Deck fulfills your dream of an amazing vacation. Master room with a King-Sized Bed, Living Room with 1 Comfortable Full Pullout Sofa Bed and BALCONY with OCEAN VIEW. No car needed.Resort fee will be charged at the check-in time at the property and it is not included.The spaceBRAND NEW Apartment with all the comfort that you need to feel at home, a PERFECT STAYCATION for family and friends. Our well-designed bedroom mixes natural wood and stone with organic textures, along with state-of-the-art technology. The fully equipped Gourmet kitchen offers a stainless steel refrigerator/freezer, one glass stove, one integrated oven, a silent dishwasher, an integrated microwave, one stove, dishes, one coffee maker, and a toaster. Spacious bedroom with a hairdryer, an electronic safe within the suite, one iron/ironing board, and TVs.Walking distance to numerous highly-rated Restaurants, Broadwalk, and Playground. Rooftop Infinity Pool and Lounge Area offer amazing ocean and Intracoastal views.Fully furnished, ceramic floors, electronic door locks, European-style cabinetry, modern-style designer fixtures, and faucets.Enjoy a very luxurious stay for 4 guests.LOCATION: Steps from the legendary HOLLYWOOD BEACH BROADWALK. BEDROOMS: This apartment accommodates 4 guests. Check the bed count below:● Bedroom 1: King Bed (for 2)● Living Room: 1 Full Pull Out Sofa Bed (for 2)Bathroom with toiletries (shampoo, conditioner, and body wash), towels and a hairdryer.CHECK-IN & CHECK-OUT: You can check-in at any time after 4PM, and you are also allowed to check-out at any time before 11AM. An early check-in or late check-out time may be available, but you should inquire before your arrival.

more description: Welcome to The HYDE Beach HouseHollywood's new hottest residential-style resort featuring beach-inspired amenities, and a prime location.Where we will make sure that this luxury 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom condo will feel like your home away from home.Enjoy breathtaking views, wrap-around balconies, contemporary European furniture, fully equipped gourmet style kitchen, High-Speed WiFi, and much more.ATTENTION PLEASE!Kindly review and agree to everything described in "Other things to note"!The spaceThis superbly styled oceanfront condo makes for a perfect luxurious getaway. Ideal for groups of friends & family looking for a high-end Florida location. Great for people looking for an extraordinary Airbnb experience. It even suits couples looking for luxurious “home away from home” or a romantic break!Living Area:The main living space is professionally designed to be tasteful as well as comfortable for your stay. The open plan kitchen has everything you will need for your stay including a toaster, cooking pots, utensils and even a coffeemaker. From the kitchen island you look out to the living room/dinning are as well as beautiful direct ocean view through ceiling windows. The dining area has a table and four chairs. The dining area leads into the living area which has a comfortable couch along with a Smart TV that is perfect after a long day at the beach.Master Bedroom :The master bedroom has a king sized bed with high quality memory foam and ecologically produced bed linens and beautiful ocean views. The walk-in closet provides plenty of space to store all your clothes and the master bath has a separate shower and tub so that you don’t have to wait for your turn. This bedroom has flat screen TV.Second Bedroom :The 2nd bedroom has  two full size beds and direct ocean view. This bedroom has flat screen TV as well. Plenty of closet space and own bathroom with shower.

more description: Hyde Resort & Residences in Hollywood. Guests of our oceanfront oasis enjoy a breezy elevated sundeck overlooking the Atlantic Ocean (with private cabanas and an infinity pool) and a Fitness Center, yoga and Pilates. Valet Parking (Variable) is not included, must be paid during your stay. Beach chairs and umbrellas are available for rent. Daily cleaning, valet parking and resort fee are not included. A credit card will be required at check-in for incidentals. You must be 21 or older to rent.The spacePerfect for a family getaway, suites mix natural wood and stone with organic textures and state-of-the-art technology. Highlights include floor-to-ceiling sliding glass doors to private furnished terraces, fully equipped kitchens with stainless appliances and granite counters, and in-suite washers/dryers.Stylish and elegant retreats with spectacular ocean views, decorated in soft earth tones accented with modern furnishings. Wall-mounted LED “smart” televisions anchor open floor-plan living areas finished with atmospheric lighting and contemporary European designer furniture

more description: An easy and pleasant walk (0.7 miles) to all of the restaurants, shops and nightlife of Wilton Drive. Note that there is no kitchen -- just a microwave and a mini-fridge. Beach towels, chairs and umbrellas.Kitchen: nonePrivate PatioThrough wall ACSound Dampening windowsGrill: Private GrillWifi: redundant high speed connections4K SmartTV, log on to your Netflix/HBO/etc accountParking: free, off-street, one carCrib, Beach gearWasher and DryerThe spaceCooking: there is no kitchen, there is a microwave and a mini-fridge. Wi-Fi: two internet connections (AT&T and Comcast) provide redundancy. Both are the highest residential speeds available.  Wifi is strong throughout the entire property. Stream 4K movies or do video calls.Laundry: you'll have access to the laundry room, shared by all 5 units. They are coin operated.Parking: assigned parking for one car in front of the building. You can park a second car two blocks away, if needed.Babies: every unit has a Pack n Play CribBeach gear: we provide beach towels, beach chairs, umbrellas, and a cooler.Grill: Unit has a private grill, you are welcome to clean it to your satisfaction and then to use it.  Most guests just heat it up to 400-500 degrees, brush it off a bit, and find that satisfactory.  If the gas runs out, let us know, and we will fill it the next morning (Sundays excepted).

more description: Imagine waking around the neighborhood and the ocean breeze in your lungs. Imagine the golden sand between your toes and the ocean wave gently whispering in your ear. Imagine having a Caribbean beach as a backyard and a resort pool with a tiki bar and tennis court available. Imagine enjoying a completely free Valet Parking for the whole length of your stay on courtesy from their company. You can have it all! An apartment in a beachfront resort right in the heart of beautiful Miami Beach.The spaceLet us pamper you in our apartment featuring a double queen-sized bed, LED TV, free unlimited 300mb WiFi Internet, and TIVO HD Here at Girasole Apartments, we believe our duty is to make your stay memorable. For this reason, we offer you an apartment with the amenities that you deserve!Give us the chance to host you and our promise to you is that you won’t regret it.Some of the features are:-Free Valet Parking on courtesy from the company in the building.-Queen Sized bed upon request  with linen provided-Fresh Bath Towels provided-Beach Chairs, Beach Umbrella and Cooler provided upon request-Fresh Beach Towels provided -Bodywash, Shampoo  provided -Free unlimited 300mb WiFi Internet-LED TV with TIVO HD -No need of keys: access the unit with combination or fob-equipped kitchenette with electric burner-Iron board and iron provided upon request -Hairdryer

more description: Location, style, and amazing shared spaces! Dharma Home Suite's apartments at Sheridan Ocean Club offer alluring elegance in a very spacious one-bedroom. You'll enjoy features such as the fully equipped kitchen with decorative countertops, ceramic floors, and a custom finish on cabinetry in both the kitchen and bathroom. The community's shared spaces and amenities are sure to fit your style with a resort-inspired pool, a 24-hour fitness studio with yoga, leash-free dog park, and more!The spaceYour exclusive apartment is in a pet friendly community, where you’ll begin to experience all of the wonderful amenities available to you. Focused on well-being Sheridan Ocean Club provides a variety of amenities, including a fitness center and dog park, available to all Dharma Home Suites guests. You also can’t go wrong with the two swimming pools in the community! Combine all of this with an ideal location near Fort Lauderdale Airport and it is clear why Sheridan Ocean Club is a top location in Dania Beach.

more description: Spectacular Upper Apartment Beachwalk Resort with Private stunning views. The building was designed by Pininfarina (Ferrari). Enjoy our spacious Upper apartment on the 17th floor,  w/ 1 Full Bath and 2 Double Beds . It features a Balcony with stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean, Intracoastal and Downtown skyline. The Studio offers a mini freeze and coffee maker.The spaceThis apartment is located at the Beachwalk Resort, at the corner of Hallandale Beach Boulevard and the Intracoastal Waterway, equidistant from Miami Beach to the south, and Ft. Lauderdale to the north.Enjoy this gorgeous condo-hotel with access to a private club on the beautiful beaches of South Florida . Valet Parking, Pool, Gym and Resort Style amenities including home comforts are ideal for families or friends travelling together.This unit has a Balcony facing south, where you can enjoy direct views of the Intracoastal Waterway and the ocean. It is just one easy block to the beach and minutes from the most fabulous nightlife, dining, shopping and recreation experience. Wireless internet is included. The room, which has two Full-Sized Beds, can comfortably accommodate up to 4 guests, and it also includes a private Bathroom and TV.You will also find a fitness center, a restaurant, an open business center with computers and printer, and you will have beach access with a free shuttle service to the beach (3 minutes away).

more description: A nicely decorated economical choice in Oakland Park near Ft. Lauderdale!- 5 miles from the famous Ft. Lauderdale beaches, clubs & popular attractions- A practical place to stay that’s centrally located & easy access to fun- A great option for couples or friends traveling on a budget- Free parking space, laundry facilities & shared pool onsite- Please read the important note belowThe spaceThis one-bedroom apartment features:- a comfy queen-sized bed in the bedroom w/a nice-sized closet and a laptop-friendly desk- hardwood floors throughout the place and tastefully decorated- a spacious and comfortable living room area for relaxing when at home- a nice dining table with bench seating to enjoy for a sit-down meal at home- a fully-equipped kitchen with all you’d need to prepare meals at home, especially great if vacationing on a budget!Plus! - A shared outdoor pool - shared laundry facilities on-site- free parking space- security systemPlease note that this apartment is not in the main tourist hotspot but you'll be just a 15-minute drive away from the famous Ft. Lauderdale beaches and beach clubs, LAS OLAS Boulevard — the main thoroughfare with everything from fashion boutiques and art galleries, to memorable restaurants, sidewalk cafes and bars like TOMMY BAHAMA MARLIN BAR, the Ft. Lauderdale RIVERWALK — a 2.5-mile stretch of brick walkway and gardens connects the Arts & Entertainment District to the commercial core of downtown. You’ll find plenty of events and activities, art displays, outdoor dining and more. Plus Ft. Lauderdale is known for its nightclubs/and discos and late-night party fun — you’ll be just a 15-min ride away from it all! It's also a good option for the long-term stay or remote worker as well. You'll vacation like you live here!

more description: Welcome to Hallandale Beach, Florida! Great Location! Great Beaches! Great Restaurants! Close to the Gulf Stream Shops, Racing and Casino.  A Centric Stay in South Florida for a great price.The spaceCasablanca Beach House is a multifamily that consists of 2 buildings with 6 independent units, with private entrance and parking space. Direct Access to the unit, not stairs. Each Unit has a Kitchen (Microwave, Stove, Oven, Refrigerator, Coffee Maker). Bedroom has a queen bed and single foldable bed.  With Great A/C.It’s and ideal stay for a couple and kids. Two adults can live comfortably but we accept up to 3 people in the room if you consider you will be comfortable.. It’s a nice economical stay, clean and in good location.Completely Private apartment you have all the space to yourself. 1 Bedroom -1 Private Bathroom with shower. Bedroom has 1 Queen mattress. You can separate living room from bedroom by closing the blind as you can see in our pictures. That way you can have two separate spaces. The Kitchen is Fully Equipped, with stove, oven, microwave, refrigerator, Freezer, ice -maker, coffee maker and cooking/ serving utensils.We provide 1 shower towels per guest, (NO beach towels or wash clothes), toilet paper, basic shampoo/conditioner and soap, dishwasher soap.

You'll enjoy features such as the fully equipped kitchen with decorative countertops, ceramic floors, and a custom finish on cabinetry in both the kitchen and bathroom. The community's shared spaces and amenities are sure to fit your style with a resort-inspired pool, a 24-hour fitness studio with yoga, leash-free dog park, and more!The spaceYour exclusive apartment is in a pet friendly community, where you’ll begin to experience all of the wonderful amenities available to you. Focused on well-being Sheridan Ocean Club provides a variety of amenities, including a fitness center and dog park, available to all Dharma Home Suites guests. You also can’t go wrong with the two swimming pools in the community! Combine all of this with an ideal location near Fort Lauderdale Airport and it is clear why Sheridan Ocean Club is a top location in Dania Beach.

more description: This studio is perfect for two with a queen size bed, fully equipped kitchen, full bath, and a Roku T.V so that you may log on to all of your favorite streaming services.. The Studio is located in our newly renovated adults only boutique hotel. We are centrally located in the heart of Hollywood.The spaceGuests are available to use everything inside the home.★ Important★This is an ADULTS ONLY boutique hotel. Kids are not allowed on the grounds. If our staff notify us of any children you will be removed from the property immediately and Airbnb will be contacted so that they cancel your booking immediately with no refund. Currently the pool onsite is NOT available to the public for safety reasons as we are in the process of installing a heating feature. If you are found in the pool you will be removed from the property and Airbnb will be contacted so that they cancel your booking immediately with no refund. We are working hard so that our guests may enjoy our pool as soon as possible! All other outside features are available for our guests to enjoy. Other things to note:★ Amenities ★☑ A/C mini splits ☑ Free parking for one car☑ Fully equipped kitchen☑ 1 Smart Roku T.V - Must log on to your own streaming services☑ 2 towels☑ 2 face towels☑ 1 bath mat☑ 1 hand towels☑ 2 rolls of toilet paper☑ 2 Kitchen towels☑5 trash bags★ Our Tropical Climate ★☑ It can get really hot during the day. Bring sunscreen to protect your skin.☑ We live in a tropical climate so bugs and mosquitoes are common we recommend bringing bug repellent.☑ We constantly treat our homes. However please follow these instruction to prevent bugs from coming into our home:☑ Keep ALL doors and windows closed as much as possible.☑ Don't leave any food or sweets out.☑ Keep the home as clean as possible during your stay.★ Maintenance ★☑ Please throw trash away in the garbage bins located at the front of the home.☑ Please do not have the A/C on with doors/ windows open as this can cause severe damage to the homes. Our cleaners ensure all windows are closed upon arrival and video document it. Any damage to the A/C will be billed to guest via Airbnb resolution center w/ proof from plumber.☑ Please do not flush anything other than toilet paper down the toilet as this can cause clogs to the pipes due to the homes age. Plumbing fees will be charged via resolution center w/ proof from plumber.☑ Landscapers come every two weeks to cut the grass.

more description: LOCATION: The Palm by Sextant is conveniently located directly across the street from Fort Lauderdale’s pristine beaches. This newly renovated tropical paradise boasts a contemporary design and a resort style pool surrounded by palm trees. You will experience the best Fort Lauderdale has to offer from world class dining to fine shopping and entertaining nightlife, all within walking distance.The spaceCHECK-IN & CHECK-OUT: Check-in is any time after 4PM and check-out is any time before 11AM. An early check-in or late check-out time may be available, please inquire about pricing at the time of booking.BEDROOM: This home sleeps 2 guests in 1 bed and 2 guests on a sofa bed. Has a smart TV in the Livingroom and the Bedroom. See bed count below.- Bedroom 1: 1 King (Sleeps 2)- Common Area: 1 Queen sofa bed (Sleeps 2)* Additional beds cannot be provided.BATHROOM: The bathroom is stocked with toiletries (shampoo, conditioner, and body wash), plush towels and washcloths, and a hairdryer.KITCHEN & DINING: The kitchen is fully stocked (200-piece culinary set) and has a full line of new appliances (blender and drip coffee maker included). The dining area has seating for 4, along with all the necessary dinnerware, and more.AMENITIES: This property has a communal laundry and a heated outdoor pool.LAUNDRY INSTRUCTIONS:The laundry room is not in the unit, it is located at the rear of the building on the opposite side of the parking garage. Laundry machines are now free and ready to use for our guests.PARKING: The parking area is located on the right and left sides in front of the building. Guests can park anywhere and we provide one parking space for each reservation.TRASH DISPOSAL: The dumpster is located on the front right side of the building. WHAT’S INCLUDED?: Iron and ironing board, washer/dryer, free WiFi (75 Mbps) and Smart TVs for your streaming apps like Netflix. Games, toys and stair gates are provided upon availability.AREA: The approximate unit size is 700 square feet.

more description: Stylish studio apartment in a modern minimalistic set up. Its design approach creates a great sense of luxury by incorporating as many functionalities as possible. The use of rich materials like Italian porcelain tiles throughout, induction cooktop, quartz countertop and backsplash, deliver a stylish ambiance all around.  Includes a double bed, en suite private bathroom, Wifi, smart TV, new mini-split AC unit, laundry and parking.  Minimum stay is 30 nights.The spaceThis is a mid size studio apartment with all the comfort you need to relax as well as getting things done, lots of light and blackout curtains. The color palette used is ideal to relax and enjoy a wonderful time in this unique minimalistic but cozy set up. Located in one of the best areas in Hollywood, FL. It's just steps away from Young Circle and Hollywood Blvd. the neighborhood is packed with bars, restaurants and shopping and just 10 minutes drive from the wonderful beach. Private parking in the rear of the building is included.The apartment is part of a duplex that has not been remodeled outside yet, you can see a picture of the outside as well.

more description: Modern 1 bedroom apartment with a memory foam queen bed. Remodeled 2021. Fully furnished. Hollywood is its own small private gem that lays between busy Miami and Fort Lauderdale.The spaceFully stalked kitchen with stainless appliances and quartz countertops, designer furnishings, stimulated wood floors, free parking, wifi, smart Tv's, and outdoor shared seating areas. Quiet, family friendly location. The Area Hollywood Beach Golf Club is a public course and is 1.5 miles away. Downtown Hollywood is just 1.5 miles south, about a 15 min walk. There you will find young circle with a performing arts auditorium, many restaurants, shopping, Publix supermarket and club/lounges.   Hollywood Beach is just 3.5 miles away. There you will find the famous Hollywood Broadwalk. Along it are dozens of restaurants and shops. You can rent bicycles and ride the beautiful 3 mile long paved stretch. Margaritaville is at the center of the Broadwalk with a stimulated surfing ride and a public music auditorium that has live music Thursday through Saturday. TipsDownload the Ride Circuit ap. If you walk 1 block south to Polk St, it will pick you up there (0.5miles away) For $2 per person it will take you anywhere in downtown or anywhere on the beach. I suggest even taken this to the beach on weekends as Parking is difficult and expensive.From Margaritaville you can get access to the free Fort Lauderdale Water taxi service that travels throughout our beautiful intercoastal water ways.Living here for almost all my life, I suggest you read my guidebook to see the best offerings my city has.

Close to the Gulf Stream Shops, Racing and Casino.  A Centric Stay in South Florida for a great price.The spaceCasablanca Beach House is a multifamily that consists of 2 buildings with 6 independent units, with private entrance and parking space. Direct Access to the unit, not stairs. Each Unit has a Kitchen (Microwave, Stove, Oven, Refrigerator, Coffee Maker). Bedroom has a queen bed .  With Great A/C.It’s and ideal stay for a couple . The Kitchen is Fully Equipped, with stove, oven, microwave, refrigerator, Freezer, ice -maker, coffee maker and cooking/ serving utensils.We provide 1 shower towels per guest, (NO beach towels or wash clothes), toilet paper, basic shampoo/conditioner and soap, dishwasher soap.

more description: Welcome to The HYDE Beach HouseHollywood's new hottest residential-style resort featuring beach-inspired amenities, and a prime location.Where we will make sure that this luxury 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom condo will feel like your home away from home.Enjoy breathtaking views, wrap-around balconies, contemporary European furniture, fully equipped gourmet style kitchen, High-Speed WiFi, and much more.ATTENTION PLEASE!Kindly review and agree to everything described in "Other things to note"!The spaceThis superbly styled oceanfront condo makes for a perfect luxurious getaway. Ideal for groups of friends & family looking for a high-end Florida location. Great for people looking for an extraordinary Airbnb experience. It even suits couples looking for luxurious “home away from home” or a romantic break!Living Area:The main living space is professionally designed to be tasteful as well as comfortable for your stay. The open plan kitchen has everything you will need for your stay including a toaster, cooking pots, utensils and even a coffeemaker. From the kitchen island you look out to the living room/dinning are as well as beautiful direct ocean view through ceiling windows. The dining area has a table and four chairs. The dining area leads into the living area which has a comfortable couch along with a Smart TV that is perfect after a long day at the beach.Master Bedroom :The master bedroom has a king sized bed with high quality memory foam and ecologically produced bed linens and beautiful ocean views. The walk-in closet provides plenty of space to store all your clothes and the master bath has a separate shower and tub so that you don’t have to wait for your turn. This bedroom has flat screen TV.Second Bedroom :The 2nd bedroom has  two full size beds and direct ocean view. This bedroom has flat screen TV as well. Plenty of closet space and own bathroom with shower.

name: Apartment in Hollywood

number of guests: 3 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in September 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
Right in front of the Boardwalk with the Biggest pool ever!  The studio is located in the Hollywood Beach Resort. Go back in time as you enter its hundred-year-old lobby, take a trip in the elevator, and waltz into our quaint studio. You’ll find a comfy king-size bed, a sofabed, a kitchenette sporting your cooking basics, a bathroom kitted out with shampoo, and towels as well as all the essentials needed to stay sanitary. We supply an umbrella and chairs so you don’t need to pay fees at the beach. Bars, restaurants, tons of jet ski rentals, and of course, the wonderful blue sea steps away.  Downtown Hollywood is 7 minutes away by car.  Get on I-95 S and in 45 minutes you will be in  South Beach, Brickell, Mimo district, and Wynwood.  
If you have questions our team works round the clock to ensure the best vacation experience ever!

Please be advised that we require our guests to complete a pre-check-in form and pay a refundable $50 deposit fee via a third-party application called Duve. This is where we provide all the important details that you must know during your stay, such as check-in instructions, full address, WIFI and so much more. Thank you!The space✅1 king bed 
✅1 sofabed

GENERAL
✅Unlimited WI-FI
✅Smart TV
✅Beach Basics: chairs, umbrellas, and towels
✅Linens/towels
✅Shampoo and soap
✅Keypad lock
✅Pack 'n play (per request)
✅Cooler (per request)

▶️(Please keep in mind that we only provide initial supplies)

Furnished and equipped kitchen with cleaning and cooking essentials including:
✅ Microwave
✅ 4 burner stove 
✅ Toaster
✅ Cooking utensils
✅ Flatware and crockery

Our unit is ideal for you and your fellow vacationers. Decorated with Love and Care, every detail is designed for your comfort.

more description: Keep it simple at this peaceful centrally located apartment. This 1br apartment is literally 50 foot steps to the sand & one of a kind 2.5 mile Beach Boardwalk that hosts Restaurants, Bars, Shopping, Bicycle, and Jogging Paths. Charming 5 Unit Bld. Located on the South End of the Boardwalk, WiFi, Coin Laundry, Cable TV, Walking Distance to Houses of Worship & Margaritaville, Off Street Metered Parking Available. 7mi to Airport/Seaport, 1mi to Grocery Stores,  Great Location for a Crash Pad!The spaceThis is a One bedroom One Bathroom apartment in a 5 unit beach apartment building on the ground floor. The bedroom has two double beds and a TV, the living area has a sofa, loveseat, and TV, WiFi and cable TV. This unit does not offer an ocean or beach view, the building is three back from the beach. The City of Hollywood has metered parking spaces on the street. Discounted parking can be purchased from the City of Hollywood Website-under non resident parking permit. The apartment was last renovated about 10 years ago. The kitchen has pots, pans, utensils, plates, cups, and bowls. We do not offer salt, pepper, spices, oil etc. We provide basic toiletries, clean linens, and towels.

number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in August 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: This charming studio is located in a newly renovated adults only boutique hotel. The unit features a two queen size beds, fully equipped kitchen, working station and a full bath. The studio has a Roku T.V so that you may log on to all of your favorite streaming services. We are centrally located in the heart of Hollywood FL, the beach, FLL and Hollywood BLVD are all 10 min away.The spaceGuests are available to use everything inside the home.★ Important★This is an ADULTS ONLY boutique hotel. Kids are not allowed on the grounds. If our staff notify us of any children you will be removed from the property immediately and Airbnb will be contacted so that they cancel your booking immediately with no refund. Currently the pool onsite is NOT available to the public for safety reasons as we are in the process of installing a heating feature. If you are found in the pool you will be removed from the property and Airbnb will be contacted so that they cancel your booking immediately with no refund. We are working hard so that our guests may enjoy our pool as soon as possible! All other outside features are available for our guests to enjoy. Other things to note:★ Amenities ★☑ A/C mini split in room☑ Free parking for one car☑ Full size kitchen☑ 1 Smart Roku T.V's - Must log on to your own streaming services☑ 4 towels☑ 4 face towels☑ 1 bath mat☑ 1 hand towels☑ 2 rolls of toilet paper☑ 2 Kitchen towels☑5 trash bags★ Our Tropical Climate ★☑ It can get really hot during the day. Bring sunscreen to protect your skin.☑ We live in a tropical climate so bugs and mosquitoes are common we recommend bringing bug repellent.☑ We constantly treat our homes. However please follow these instruction to prevent bugs from coming into our home:☑ Keep ALL doors and windows closed as much as possible.☑ Don't leave any food or sweets out.☑ Keep the home as clean as possible during your stay.★ Maintenance ★☑ Please throw trash away in the garbage bins located at the front of the home.☑ Please do not have the A/C on with doors/ windows open as this can cause severe damage to the homes. Our cleaners ensure all windows are closed upon arrival and video document it. Any damage to the A/C will be billed to guest via Airbnb resolution center w/ proof from plumber.☑ Please do not flush anything other than toilet paper down the toilet as this can cause clogs to the pipes due to the homes age. Plumbing fees will be charged via resolution center w/ proof from plumber.☑ Landscapers come every two weeks to cut the grass.

more description: Fort Lauderdale, Florida, is known for a 24-mile span of glistening beaches and rolling Atlantic Ocean waves while set amongst the exotic Everglades. Whether you're looking for outdoor activities (land + water), unique dining, shopping, outdoor entertainment, or museums, there is something for everyone in this one-stop vacation destination.The spaceWe have designed this NEWLY RENOVATED home to have all of your essential needs!Boasting 1500 square feet of cozy living space, whether you're spending time with family or friends, this home will make you never want to leave  the town of Fort Lauderdale.PETS:Pet fee is 300$ and We do accept pets with prior approval. Please note if you’re interested in bringing your pet in the initial message. If you’re away from the home, please crate your pet. The area is pet-friendly, so you will find plenty of places to let Fido join you.You MUST receive prior approval for pets, otherwise you will be charged a $300 penalty.We accept a maximum of two dogs at our short-term rental. If away from the home, we ask that your pet be crated. The area is quite dog friendly; therefore, there are many places to bring Fido.If there are any damages from dogs, service animals, or emotional support animals, we impose an additional $150 cleaning fee.HOME LAYOUTFollow along- when entering the front door, you will walk into the open concept living room, dining area, and kitchen. LIVING ROOMSink into the luxurious sofa after a long adventurous day by watching a movie/show on our SMART  65" TV. You will have access to the guest Roku and Netflix accounts. If you would like to access your streaming services, just remember your passwords!!KITCHENFully stocked with all of the kitchen necessities you need to prepare a great meal at home. You will find a stovetop, oven, and full-size refrigerator to fix meals for large groups. Visit a local farmers market or grocery store and then enjoy preparing a delectable meal. If dining out, there are many excellent local restaurants in the area, or get take-out and enjoy it on the back patio under the stars or in the dining room.+Coffee Maker, coffee, tea, sugar, sugar substitutes, and creamer. +Toaster, Baking Sheets, Basic Seasonings.DINING ROOMThe dining room table is outfitted with a table fit for six and additional seating at the bar.BEDROOM 1The "main bedroom" is outfitted with a king bed, luxury mattress, two bedside tables, a ceiling fan, bedside lamps, a dresser, a chest, a closet, and a smart tv.MAIN BATHROOMThe main bathroom has a walk-in shower (with a small lip) and vanity, located directly off the main bedroom.BEDROOM 2The second bedroom is equipped with a queen-sized bed, luxury mattress, bedside table, ceiling fan, a chest of drawers, closet, and smart tv.SHARED BATHROOM The shared bathroom has a tub/shower combination and a single vanity.BEDROOM 3 The third bedroom has a Twin over (Twin) Trundle, a bedside table, a chest of drawers, a desk + chair, a closet, and smart tv.Washer + DryerYou will find a Washer and Dryer in the unit. We do provide detergent and dryer sheets for you to use!PROXIMITY TO NEARBY TOWNS, ATTRACTIONS, AND AIRPORTAirport:Fort Lauderdale- Hollywood International Airport: 12 MinutesDowntown Fort Lauderdale: 13 MinutesBreakfast, Brunch, Lunch, + DinnerThe Alchemist Café: 17 Minutes (Coffee, Tea, Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch)Tom Jenkins BBQ: 12 MinutesThe Foxy Brown: 16 Minutes (Comfort Food)Sea Watch on the Ocean: 23 Minutes (Seafood)Padrino's Cuban: 7 Minutes (Authentic Cuban)Outdoor Activities:SnorkelingScuba DivingPaddleboardingJet Skiing KayakingBoat ToursBrews + Libations

more description:
Right in front of the Boardwalk with the Biggest pool ever!  The studio is located in the Hollywood Beach Resort. Go back in time as you enter its hundred-year-old lobby, take a trip in the elevator, and waltz into our quaint studio. You’ll find a comfy king-size bed, a sofabed, a kitchenette sporting your cooking basics, a bathroom kitted out with shampoo, and towels as well as all the essentials needed to stay sanitary. We supply an umbrella and chairs so you don’t need to pay fees at the beach. Bars, restaurants, tons of jet ski rentals, and of course, the wonderful blue sea steps away.  Downtown Hollywood is 7 minutes away by car.  Get on I-95 S and in 45 minutes you will be in  South Beach, Brickell, Mimo district, and Wynwood.  
If you have questions our team works round the clock to ensure the best vacation experience ever!

Please be advised that we require our guests to complete a pre-check-in form and pay a refundable $50 deposit fee via a third-party application called Duve. This is where we provide all the important details that you must know during your stay, such as check-in instructions, full address, WIFI and so much more. Thank you!The space✅1 king bed

more description: BOOK 2 NIGHTS GET 1 FREE - DECEMBER SPECIAL. Resort and valet fees flexible for 5+ nights. Lux condo at Hyde Beach House. Resort across from Hallandale Beach. Full amenities on both Hyde properties available. Heated pools, restaurants, bars, fitness center, beach club, spa, tennis court, beach service, etc. Minutes away from downtown Hollywood, casinos, waterways, parks, golf, horse tracks, boat tours, Alligator tours, airport, and highways.The space***Please let us know if this is a special occasion or seasonal celebration***Full list of amenities:- 24/7 Front Desk and Security- Luggage Drop Off - Complimentary Wifi Resort wide- Beach Club Services (Beach lounge chairs, towels, and umbrella)- State of the Art Fitness Center- 2 Outdoor Pools, Cabanas, and Jacuzzi Spa- Restaurant and Bar with poolside services- Tennis, Basketball, and Racquetball Courts- Outdoor Theatre- Meeting rooms- Curated Art Collection - All amenities at the Hyde Beach House Resort and Residencies across the street, including Hair Salon and Spa.Location offers near by accessibility to popular attractions such as:- Fort Lauderdale International Airport- Major Highways - Hallandale Beach and Boardwalk- Downtown Hollywood- Mardi Gras, Hard Rock, and the Big Easy Casino  Aventura Mall- Intercostal waterways, lakes, and parks. Including Gulfstream Park Racing   and Oleta River Park- Restaurants and Super Markets- Golf and tennis club- Alligator tours- Escape Rooms- Historical Building- Everglades airboat tourHouse Rules:We thank you in advance for treating our condo as your own, your cooperation with our house rules, and consideration to all other gusts onsite.1. No smoking in unit or property common areas. Violations are subject to fine.2. No pets. Service/ESA must be disclosed and provide appropriate documentation at booking to avoid potential fine for violation of pet rules in result to their presence, odors, shedding, etc.3. Guest capacity must be within reservation and full names must be provided to host upon booking.4. Please report any issues or damages to your host upon check in as damages to unit or common areas resulting in your stay are subject to fine. This includes and is not limited to altering electrical network and other installations.5. Kindly avoid noise related nuisance between the hours of 10 pm and 7 am. 6. No BBQ equipment in unit.7. No rooftop access.Upon reserving this home you agree to the hold harmless agreement below:NO LIABILITY/INDEMNIFICATION/HOLD HARMLESS: The owners of the property do not assume liability for the loss, theft, damage or injury (or death) to persons or their personal property. Guests agree to indemnify and hold the owners harmless for any liabilities, theft, damage, cost or expense whatsoever arising from or related to any claim or litigation which may arise out of or in connection with Guests’ use and occupancy of the rental property, including but not limited to claims for personal injury or property damage/loss.

more description: Steps from the legendary HOLLYWOOD BOARDWALK overlooking a beautiful beach surrounded by bars, live music events, and wonderful restaurants - All at walking distance. This MODERN CONDO RESORT with a ROOFTOP INFINITY POOL, Hot Tub, Gym and Sun Deck fulfills your dream of an amazing vacation. Studio with a King-Sized Bed and BALCONY. No car needed.Resort fee will be charged at the check-in time at the property and it is not included.The spaceBRAND NEW Apartment with all the comfort that you need to feel at home, a PERFECT STAYCATION for family and friends. Our well-designed 1 Studio mixes natural wood and stone with organic textures, along with state-of-the-art technology. The Studio offers a stainless steel refrigerator, a microwave, dishes, one coffee maker, and a toaster. Spacious bedroom with a hairdryer, an electronic safe within the suite, one iron/ironing board, and TVs.Bathroom is stocked with toiletries (shampoo, conditioner, and body wash), towels and a hairdryer.Walking distance to numerous highly-rated Restaurants, Boardwalk, and Playground. Rooftop infinity pool and lounge area offer amazing ocean and Intracoastal views.Fully furnished, ceramic floors, electronic door locks, European-style cabinetry, modern-style designer fixtures, and faucets. Enjoy a very luxurious stay for 2 guests.LOCATION: Steps from the legendary HOLLYWOOD BEACH BROADWALK. CHECK-IN & CHECK-OUT: You can check-in at any time after 4PM, and you are also allowed to check-out at any time before 11AM. An early check-in or late check-out time may be available, but you should inquire first.

more description: Our lovely private Studio is located in very convenient area close to Downtown Hollywood. The space features comfortable queen size bed, full kitchen with full size appliances, private bathroom, sofa, fast WiFi and TV. You have a private entrance by the alley street (service street) and parking on the spot. We are close to the beach, restaurants, bars and mall. Also there is a bus and train station nearby. Airports FLL and MIA are few minutes drive away.The spacePrivate studio with one bedroom, one bathroom and full kitchen with private patio and free parking. The bus station is few steps away.It is excellently located in a quiet and safe neighborhood with access to great fun few minutes away. It is centrally located between two major airports. Fort Lauderdale / Hollywood (FLL) International Airport is 15 minutes drive away, and Miami International Airport is 25 minutes drive away. Close also to Port Everglades, Port of Miami and I-95.

description: Beautiful beach place with stunning ocean view
name: Apartment in Hollywood
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Mike5 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in July 2020**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space. Sitting right on the beach, with privet beach excess .this condo resort features beach-side pools, full gym and covered parking for guests. Grab your towel and take a few steps to relax on the award winning Hollywood Beach, or just relax on your private balcony with ocean view. The condo is also a short walking distance to supermarkets, Walmart ,restaurants and shops.The spaceFrom the balcony, you can see the Atlantic Ocean, the beach, and the intracoastal waterway. High-speed internet and cable TV. If you use your Netflix account, please remember to remove it when you leave.Our apartment has always been praised for its cleanliness, a standard that we will re-enforce and enhance given the times we are currently living.The unit is NON-smoking, NO pets allowed under any circumstances. The condo has a policy that renters must be over 25 years old.Also provided: bath/beach towels, iron & board, extra covers & pillows, hair dryer, beach chairs and umbrella...Key characteristics of the property:- Direct access to the semi-private beach with lifeguard- 874+ sq. ft.- Non-smoking strictly enforced inside the unit.- Porcelain tile floor throughout the unit.- Heated pool with a lounge area, umbrellas overlooking the ocean and free Wifi.- Modern 24 hr. laundry facility is located on each floor (not inside unit) at a cost per wash/dry.- Free high-speed Wi-Fi Internet & cable TV- Flat-screen T.V. in Living Room and in Master bedroom.- 24-hour front desk concierge.- 24-hour security gated condo.- Fitness center (gym)- Complimentary wifi in lobby and on pool deck- Kayaks paddle boards and jet skis are available to rent at next building (Diplomat Beach resort)- Many restaurants in adjacent hotels within walking distance- Mini Market and Café with delivery service to unit, pool & beach- Business center available with extra fee payable at building- Maximum occupancy: 4 Guests, exceeding the published limit: USD 500 each guest penalty per dayONLY OUR REGISTERED GUESTS (at the receiving office) ARE PERMITTED ENTRANCE TO THE PROPERTY OR THE APARTMENT. (At the office you will get pool bracelets).In order to be registered we require a copy of your passport or driver's license picture ID, and that of all other guests that will be staying in the apartment with you. This is for security and safety purposes only.We are proud of keeping our condo very, very clean, with comfortable beds, towels, and excellent quality mattress, pillows and linens to make your stay as relaxing as possible. We want you to love our place as much as we do.

more description: This comfortable apartment is a fantastic home-away-from-home in Ft. Lauderdale!- Vacation like a local just 2 miles to downtown Ft. Lauderdale’s Riverwalk- 3.4 miles from the famous Ft. Lauderdale beaches like Las Olas- A kitchen for preparing meals at home in comfort; great if on a budget - Free parking on premises (first come first served) & coin-operated laundry facilitiesThe spaceThis comfortable and practical apartment in Ft. Lauderdale is perfect for a solo traveler or a couple coming to the area to see the sights and mostly the famous beaches of Ft. Lauderdale! You’ll have all the comforts of home but vacation like a local! This one-bedroom apartment features:- a queen-sized bed in the bedroom with a full ensuite bathroom- nice hardwood flooring throughout the space- a cozy living room area with a Smart TV for relaxing when home from the day’s activities- an equipped kitchen with all you’d need to prepare meals to eat at home; especially great if you’re traveling a budget- a cute dining area and table for two to enjoy meals at home in comfort- a coin-operated washing machine and dryer in the shared  laundry facilities at the property- free parking All of this and just a short distance to the famous Ft. Lauderdale beaches like Las Olas, downtown’s Riverwalk, and other South Florida attractions. Great place for the long-term stay. You’ll have all the comforts of home and vacation like you live here!

more description: Comfy, cozy, 1 bed 1 bath apt in Hollywood! Ample parking, wifi, full kitchen/bath, full size futon, queen bed, backyard, 2 smart tvs. Less than 10 mins from Ft. Lauderdale Airport, I95, Oakwood Plaza, shopping and beaches. PLEASE READ: PRICE IS FOR 1 PERSON, EACH ADDITIONAL PERSON IS $25 PER NIGHT, 3 PEOPLE MAX. $65 PET FEE FOR EACH PET. NO PARTIES! NO SMOKING! NO UNAUTHORIZED GUESTS! CHECK IN 3PM- CHECKOUT 11AM. ALL GUESTS MUST SUBMIT PHOTO ID/PHONE # TO CHECK IN. MIN AGE REQUIREMENT 25+The spaceUpon entering the apartment, we have the living room with futon sofa, coffee table, side table, and dining area with dining table and 4 chairs. Facing the futon we have a smart tv with Amazon Firestick for movies, games, live tv, streaming and entertainment etc. Please feel free to plug in your own devices such as Apple Tv, Xbox, Playstation etc. to enjoy as well. The living room will follow into our kitchen which contains a cooking stove, refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, pots, pans, plates and silverware as well as other cooking/baking utensils and materials. If you ever need any extra supplies just let us know. The kitchen has a back door, which leads to our backyard for you to enjoy with your pets. Through the hallway in the living room is the bathroom, with tub for bathing and showering, toilet, and sink. Toiletries, towels, soap, and shampoo are provided for you, please let us know if you ever need any more also. Next to the bathroom is the bedroom with a queen size bed, side table and lamp, smart tv also with Amazon Firestick for entertainment, and a closet for you to hang your clothes and store your belongings. Linens, pillows, covers, hangers, iron and ironing board are also provided for you. Beside the bedroom is a locked door which leads to another adjacent unit, similar to hotel setups, which can also be booked additionally for larger parties. Otherwise, each unit is completely private and no unit has access to any other adjacent unit. The apartment has central A/C, hot water, and an electronic keypad lock system at the front door for access and security.

more description: This charming studio is located in a newly renovated adults only boutique hotel. The unit features a two queen size beds, fully equipped kitchen, working station and a full bath. The studio has a Roku T.V so that you may log on to all of your favorite streaming services. We are centrally located in the heart of Hollywood FL, the beach, FLL and Hollywood BLVD are all 10 min away.The spaceGuests are available to use everything inside the home.★ Important★This is an ADULTS ONLY boutique hotel. Kids are not allowed on the grounds. If our staff notify us of any children you will be removed from the property immediately and Airbnb will be contacted so that they cancel your booking immediately with no refund. Currently the pool onsite is NOT available to the public for safety reasons as we are in the process of installing a heating feature. If you are found in the pool you will be removed from the property and Airbnb will be contacted so that they cancel your booking immediately with no refund. We are working hard so that our guests may enjoy our pool as soon as possible! All other outside features are available for our guests to enjoy. Other things to note:★ Amenities ★☑ A/C mini split in room☑ Free parking for one car☑ Full size kitchen☑ 1 Smart Roku T.V's - Must log on to your own streaming services☑ 4 towels☑ 4 face towels☑ 1 bath mat☑ 1 hand towels☑ 2 rolls of toilet paper☑ 2 Kitchen towels☑5 trash bags★ Our Tropical Climate ★☑ It can get really hot during the day. Bring sunscreen to protect your skin.☑ We live in a tropical climate so bugs and mosquitoes are common we recommend bringing bug repellent.☑ We constantly treat our homes. However please follow these instruction to prevent bugs from coming into our home:☑ Keep ALL doors and windows closed as much as possible.☑ Don't leave any food or sweets out.☑ Keep the home as clean as possible during your stay.★ Maintenance ★☑ Please throw trash away in the garbage bins located at the front of the home.☑ Please do not have the A/C on with doors/ windows open as this can cause severe damage to the homes. Our cleaners ensure all windows are closed upon arrival and video document it. Any damage to the A/C will be billed to guest via Airbnb resolution center w/ proof from plumber.☑ Please do not flush anything other than toilet paper down the toilet as this can cause clogs to the pipes due to the homes age. Plumbing fees will be charged via resolution center w/ proof from plumber.☑ Landscapers come every two weeks to cut the grass.

more description: An elegantly appointed 1 Bed / 1.5 Bath Luxury Condo Unit with floor-to-ceiling sliding glass doors leading to a stunning balcony located right on the   ocean. Access to the private beach is located through the Lobby of the building, just past the pool & sundeck. The unit is fully equipped with all of the comforts one would need to effortlessly enjoy their stay including a fully stocked kitchen & linen closet, and a wide selection of beach toys for all ages (Sand Buckets to Snorkels).The space*Newly Renovated & Furnished Unit* SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS:•	Bedroom – (1) King Bed •	Living Room – (1) Queen Pullout Sofa Bed ADDITIONAL UNIT AMENITES :•	Central AC & Heating •	55” 4K HDTV •	High Speed Wi-Fi (+300 Mbps)•	Towels / Bedsheets / Soap •	Extra Pillows & Blankets •	Toilet Paper / Paper Towels •	Keurig Coffee Maker•	Electric Tea Kettle •	Toaster •	Dishwasher •	Fridge / Freezer •	Stove / Oven •	Microwave•	Plates / Glasses / Silverware for 8ppl •	Pots / Pants / Kitchen Utensils •	Hair Dryer •	Iron and Ironing Board  •	Beach Towels / Beach Umbrella / Beach Toys / Floating Noodles & Rings / Snorkeling GearGUEST ACCESS & ARRIVAL EXPERIENCE:•	Check-in with Front Desk to register and receive Key Fob for building amenities•	Custom numeric code provided for access to the unit   ADDITIONAL COSTS:•	Building Amenity Access (Key Fob) - $30 for every two adults •	Valet Parking - $10 per day / $150 per month •	Cleaning Fee - $175 per reservationSian Ocean Residences is located a short walk away from Hollywood’s Iconic Boardwalk featuring a wide range of dining options and activates. Hop in the car and drive over to Miami, Ft. Lauderdale or Bar Harbor, all are less than 20 min away! Local shops and restaurants are also accessible on foot or by the free community shuttle that makes pickups/drop-offs just across the street.  BUILDING AMENITIES: •	Front Desk / Building Concierge staffed 24 hours •	State of the art fitness center •	Seasonally heated pool •	Laundry Facilities on every floor •	Game Room with Pool, Ping Pong, Darts, Etc. •	Valet ParkingLOCAL ATTRACTIONS:•Diplomat Beach Resort –0.1 Miles•Gulfstream Park Racing and Casino –2.2 Miles•Aventura Mall –4.2 Miles•Bal Harbor Mall –7.1 Miles•FLL Airport –7.9 Miles•Hard Rock Hotel & Casino –10.5 Miles•Ft.
