more description: Modern 1 bedroom apartment. Remodeled 2021. Fully furnished. Hollywood is its own small private gem that lays between busy Miami and Fort Lauderdale. My Neighborhood, Northlake, is one of most exclusive areas in Hollywood.The spaceFully stalked kitchen with stainless appliances and quartz countertops, designer furnishings, stimulated wood floors, free parking, wifi, smart Tv's, and outdoor shared seating areas. Quiet, family friendly location. The Area Hollywood Beach Golf Club is a public course and is at the end of my street , less than a half of mile away. Downtown Hollywood is just 1.5 miles south, about a 15 min walk. There you will find young circle with a performing arts auditorium, many restaurants, shopping, publix supermarket and club/lounges.   Hollywood Beach is just 2.5 miles away. There you will find the famous Hollywood Broadwalk. Along it are dozens of restaurants and shops. You can rent bicycles and ride the beautiful 3 mile long paved stretch. Margaritaville is at the center of the Broadwalk with a stimulated surfing ride and a public music auditorium that has live music Thursday through Saturday. You can also have access to my 2 person kayak just message me. TipsDownload the Ride Circuit ap. If you walk south to Johnson St, it will pick you up there (0.5miles away) For $2 per person it will take you anywhere in downtown or anywhere on the beach. I suggest even taken this to the beach on weekends as Parking is difficult and expensive.From Margaritaville you can get access to the free Fort Lauderdale Water taxi service that travels throughout our beautiful intercoastal water ways.Living here for almost all my life, I suggest you read my guidebook to see the best offerings my city has.

more description: Steps from the legendary HOLLYWOOD BOARDWALK that spots a beautiful beach surrounded by bars, live music events, and wonderful restaurants - All walking distance. This MODERN CONDO RESORT with a ROOFTOP INFINITY POOL, Hot Tub, Gym and sundeck completes the experience for an amazing vacation. This Studio with a king-size bed. No car needed.Resort fee will be charged at the check-in time at the property and it is not included.The spaceBRAND NEW apartment with all the comfort that you need to feel like home. Perfect for family and friends getaway, our well-appointed 1 studio mix natural wood and stone with organic textures and state-of-the-art technology. The Studio offers stainless steel refrigerator, microwave, dishes, coffee maker, and toaster  . Spacious bedroom with hairdryer, electronic safe within the suite, iron/ironing board, and TVs.Walking distance to numerous highly-rated restaurants, boardwalk, and playground. Rooftop infinity pool and lounge area offer amazing ocean and Intracoastal views.Fully furnished, ceramic floors, electronic door locks, European-style cabinetry, modern-style designer fixtures, and faucets. Enjoy a very luxurious stay for 2 guests.LOCATION: Steps from the legendary HOLLYWOOD BEACH BOARDWALK. Bathroom is stocked with toiletries (shampoo, conditioner, and body wash), towels and a hairdryer.CHECK-IN & CHECK-OUT: Check-in is any time after 4PM and check-out is any time before 11AM. An early check-in or late check-out time may be available, please inquire it complementary.

more description: This is a home with a hostel vibe. Private bedrooms. There are 5 rooms in total. Common areas (including bathroom) are shared with other guests.- Private A/C- Private door to back yard- Queen size Bed- Blackout Curtains- Smart Roku TV- Self Check-in- Wifi- No curfew- Private A/C- Parking for 1 car- Full kitchen- Secure Room with Key and Lock- Bath Essentials & towels- Closet space- FLL Airport: 6 miles- Las Olas Beach: 6 miles- Downtown:4milesThe spaceWhat makes our place so unique is the environment; it's a combination of a boutique hostel and a home stay. You can expect to meet interesting and cool people from all over the world. We have hosted people from all continents. However it's more private than a typical hostel since all the guest rooms are private, so it's also possible to just rest and keep it to yourself, if that's what you are looking for.Our amenities include (but are not limited to)KITCHEN-  Cook top, oven, microwave- Fridge & Freezer- Coffee maker- Dishes & Silverware- Pots & pansBATHROOM (shared)- Towels , Wash Clothes & Bath Mat- Hand soap & Body soap- Shampoo & Conditioner- Toilet Paper & Hot WaterBEDROOM (private)- Queen size bed- Memory Foam Mattress- Sheets & pillows - Smart TV (no cable)- Closet & Hangers- Lock & Key- Black-out curtainsOTHER- Free Wifi in the house for your convenience - Cleaning: Our dedicated cleaning crew comes once a day to clean all the common areas, the guest rooms are deep cleaned before every check-in. We don't provide house keeping in the room during the stay, but clean linens and towels are always available when requested

more description: Steps from the HOLLYWOOD BOARDWALK overlooking a beautiful beach surrounded by bars, live music events , and wonderful restaurants - This MODERN CONDO RESORT with a ROOFTOP  POOL, Hot Tub, Gym and Sun Deck fulfills your dream of an amazing vacation. Master room with a King-Sized Bed, Living Room + 1 Full Pullout Sofa Bed, plus 1 bedroom w/ Full Pullout Sofa Bed and FRONT BAY TERRACE. No car needed.Resort fee will be charged at the check-in time at the property and it is not included.The spaceBRAND NEW Apartment with all the comfort that you need to feel at home, a PERFECT STAYCATION for family and friends. Our well-designed bedroom mixes natural wood and stone with organic textures, along with state-of-the-art technology. The fully equipped Gourmet kitchen offers a stainless steel refrigerator/freezer, one glass stove, one integrated oven, a silent dishwasher, an integrated microwave, one stove, dishes, one coffee maker, and a toaster. Spacious bedroom with a hairdryer, an electronic safe within the suite, one iron/ironing board, and TVs.Walking distance to numerous highly-rated Restaurants, Broadwalk, and Playground. Rooftop Infinity Pool and Lounge Area offer amazing ocean and Intracoastal views.Fully furnished, ceramic floors, electronic door locks, European-style cabinetry, modern-style designer fixtures, and faucets. Enjoy a very luxurious stay for 6 guests.LOCATION: Steps from the legendary HOLLYWOOD BEACH BROADWALK. BEDROOMS: This home accommodates 6 guests. Check the bed count below:● Bedroom 1: King Bed (for 2)● Living Room: 1 Full Pull Out Sofa Bed  (for 2)● Bedroom 2 : 1 Full Pull Out Sofa Bed  (for 2)Bathroom with toiletries (shampoo, conditioner, and body wash), towels and a hairdryer.CHECK-IN & CHECK-OUT: You can check-in at any time after 4PM, and you are also allowed to check-out at any time before 11AM. An early check-in or late check-out time may be available, but you should inquire before your arrival.

more description: This CHARMING fully-remodeled cottage with a private fenced tropical backyard,  is located in the heart of Hollywood: 2 blocks from downtown.Perfect for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers.The layout is very original: In the main room there is the queen size bed and the kitchen and in the Florida room there is the living and dining area.The private fenced Backyard with patio is ideal for relaxing and enjoying the Florida weatherLearn More Below & Experience Hollywood With Us!The spaceYou’ll love This brand new place because of the comfy bed and cozy feel and you will feel like your at home!!!It's very rare to find a property for 2 guests with such a private backyard: Catch some rays or relax on the elegant, secluded patioThis accommodation has a private entrance and a free private parking spaceIt's behind the main house, you enter from a separate front gate and you walk through a gravel path to the back of the property.It’s close to the beach, the stunning broadwalk, Stranahan River, top restaurants, pubs and shops.NO CABLE TV. more description: A nicely decorated economical choice in Oakland Park near Ft. Lauderdale! - 5 miles from the famous Ft. Lauderdale beaches, clubs & popular attractions- A practical place to stay that’s centrally located & easy access to fun - A great option for couples or friends traveling on a budget- Free parking space, laundry facilities & shared pool onsite- Please read the important note belowThe spaceThis one-bedroom apartment features:- a queen-sized bed in the bedroom w/a good-sized closet- lovely hardwood floors throughout the place - a spacious and comfortable living room area for relaxing when at home plus a Smart TV- a dining table to seat 4 comfortably for a sit-down meal- a fully-equipped kitchen with all you’ll need to prepare meals at home, especially great if vacationing on a budget!Plus! - A shared outdoor pool - shared laundry facilities on-site- free parking space- security systemPlease note that this apartment is not in the main tourist hotspot but you'll be just a 15-minute drive away from the famous Ft. Lauderdale beaches and beach clubs, LAS OLAS Boulevard — the main thoroughfare with everything from fashion boutiques and art galleries, to memorable restaurants, sidewalk cafes and bars like TOMMY BAHAMA MARLIN BAR, the Ft. Lauderdale RIVERWALK — a 2.5-mile stretch of brick walkway and gardens connects the Arts & Entertainment District to the commercial core of downtown. You’ll find plenty of events and activities, art displays, outdoor dining and more. Plus Ft. Lauderdale is known for its nightclubs/and discos and late-night party fun — you’ll be just a 15-min ride away from it all! It's also a good option for the long-term stay or remote worker as well. You'll vacation like you live here!

more description: This is a home with a hostel vibe. Private bedrooms. There are 5 rooms in total. Common areas (including bathroom) are shared with other guests.- Private A/C- Private door to back yard- Queen size Bed- Blackout Curtains- Smart Roku TV- Self Check-in- Wifi- No curfew- Private A/C- Parking for 1 car- Full kitchen- Secure Room with Key and Lock- Bath Essentials & towels- Closet space- FLL Airport: 6 miles- Las Olas Beach: 6 miles- Downtown:4milesThe spaceWhat makes our place so unique is the environment; it's a combination of a boutique hostel and a home stay. You can expect to meet interesting and cool people from all over the world. We have hosted people from all continents. However it's more private than a typical hostel since all the guest rooms are private, so it's also possible to just rest and keep it to yourself, if that's what you are looking for.Our amenities include (but are not limited to)KITCHEN-  Cook top, oven, microwave- Fridge & Freezer- Coffee maker- Dishes & Silverware- Pots & pansBATHROOM (shared)- Towels , Wash Clothes & Bath Mat- Hand soap & Body soap- Shampoo & Conditioner- Toilet Paper & Hot WaterBEDROOM (private)- Queen size bed- Memory Foam Mattress- Sheets & pillows - Smart TV (no cable)- Closet & Hangers- Lock & Key- Black-out curtainsOTHER- Free Wifi in the house for your convenience - Cleaning: Our dedicated cleaning crew comes once a day to clean all the common areas, the guest rooms are deep cleaned before every check-in. We don't provide house keeping in the room during the stay, but clean linens and towels are always available when requested

more description: Modern 1 bedroom apartment with a memory foam queen bed. Remodeled 2021. Fully furnished. Hollywood is its own small private gem that lays between busy Miami and Fort Lauderdale.The spaceFully stalked kitchen with stainless appliances and quartz countertops, designer furnishings, stimulated wood floors, free parking, wifi, smart Tv's, and outdoor shared seating areas. Quiet, family friendly location. The Area Hollywood Beach Golf Club is a public course and is 1.5 miles away. Downtown Hollywood is just 1.5 miles south, about a 15 min walk. There you will find young circle with a performing arts auditorium, many restaurants, shopping, Publix supermarket and club/lounges.   Hollywood Beach is just 3.5 miles away. There you will find the famous Hollywood Broadwalk. Along it are dozens of restaurants and shops. You can rent bicycles and ride the beautiful 3 mile long paved stretch. Margaritaville is at the center of the Broadwalk with a stimulated surfing ride and a public music auditorium that has live music Thursday through Saturday. TipsDownload the Ride Circuit ap. If you walk 1 block south to Polk St, it will pick you up there (0.5miles away) For $2 per person it will take you anywhere in downtown or anywhere on the beach. I suggest even taken this to the beach on weekends as Parking is difficult and expensive.From Margaritaville you can get access to the free Fort Lauderdale Water taxi service that travels throughout our beautiful intercoastal water ways.Living here for almost all my life, I suggest you read my guidebook to see the best offerings my city has.

description: The Nook Hollywood | Few steps away from the Beach | Pool and Free Parking!
name: Apartment in Hollywood
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Andrea4 guests ·  · Studio ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in March 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: - Create beautiful memories with your group that will last a lifetime. The Nook lives in a secluded spot just a few minutes drive from the Hollywood Beach Broadwalk. It’s situated on an island only accessible via bridge/drawbridge, resting between the Intracoastal and the great Atlantic. Take 20 steps (I’ve literally counted) and you’ll find yourself embraced by the roaring sound of the tide’s eternal movements. - This spacious and comfortable one-level studio is decorated with everything you require for a perfect getaway by the sea, equipped with all the essentials needed for a simple, carefree vacation. PARK FOR FREE, ascend the patio and waltz into our quaint studio where you’ll find two snug full-size beds, a bathroom kitted out with shampoo and towels, and a Fully Equipped Kitchen sporting your cooking basics just in case you feel like making dinner at home.- We supply an umbrella and chairs so you don’t need to pay fees at the beach. Enjoy our Barbecue space while you relax beneath the stars or sunshine. Walk to Tiki Tiki for dinner or take a short drive down the road to Le Tub for a water-side burger. Amongst various walkable marinas rent catermerangs, jet skis, sailboats, scooters, and much more. Take a 17 minute drive and you’ll reach Fort Lauderdale Beach known for its nightlife. If you have questions our team works round the clock to ensure the best vacation experience ever!The space- 2 comfortable full bedsOUTDOOR LIVING: - furnished outside patio w/ seating areas.INDOOR LIVING:  - Flat-screen TVs - Modern decor.KITCHEN: - All new appliances - Full-size kitchen and refrigerator- Coffee maker- Toaster- Tea pot- Microwave and oven.GENERAL:- Free WiFi- Central A/C- Linens/towels- Shampoo and soap- Keypad lock- Pack 'n play (per request)- Cooler (per request)▶️Please keep in mind that we only provide initial supplies- No smoking- No pets- No parties or events▶️Check-in is any time after 4 PM

number of guests: 8 guests · **__** · 3 bedrooms · **__** · 9 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in August 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Fort Lauderdale, Florida, is known for a 24-mile span of glistening beaches and rolling Atlantic Ocean waves while set amongst the exotic Everglades. Whether you're looking for outdoor activities (land + water), unique dining, shopping, outdoor entertainment, or museums, there is something for everyone in this one-stop vacation destination.The spaceWe have designed this NEWLY RENOVATED home to have all of your essential needs!Boasting 1500 square feet of cozy living space, whether you're spending time with family or friends, this home will make you never want to leave  the town of Fort Lauderdale.PETS:Pet fee is 300$ and We do accept pets with prior approval. Please note if you’re interested in bringing your pet in the initial message. If you’re away from the home, please crate your pet. The area is pet-friendly, so you will find plenty of places to let Fido join you.You MUST receive prior approval for pets, otherwise you will be charged a $300 penalty.We accept a maximum of two dogs at our short-term rental. If away from the home, we ask that your pet be crated. The area is quite dog friendly; therefore, there are many places to bring Fido.If there are any damages from dogs, service animals, or emotional support animals, we impose an additional $150 cleaning fee.HOME LAYOUTFollow along- when entering the front door, you will walk into the open concept living room, dining area, and kitchen. LIVING ROOMSink into the luxurious sofa after a long adventurous day by watching a movie/show on our SMART  65" TV. You will have access to the guest Roku and Netflix accounts. If you would like to access your streaming services, just remember your passwords!!KITCHENFully stocked with all of the kitchen necessities you need to prepare a great meal at home. You will find a stovetop, oven, and full-size refrigerator to fix meals for large groups. Visit a local farmers market or grocery store and then enjoy preparing a delectable meal. If dining out, there are many excellent local restaurants in the area, or get take-out and enjoy it on the back patio under the stars or in the dining room.+Coffee Maker, coffee, tea, sugar, sugar substitutes, and creamer. +Toaster, Baking Sheets, Basic Seasonings.DINING ROOMThe dining room table is outfitted with a table fit for six and additional seating at the bar.BEDROOM 1The "main bedroom" is outfitted with a king bed, luxury mattress, two bedside tables, a ceiling fan, bedside lamps, a dresser, a chest, a closet, and a smart tv.MAIN BATHROOMThe main bathroom has a walk-in shower (with a small lip) and vanity, located directly off the main bedroom.BEDROOM 2The second bedroom is equipped with a queen-sized bed, luxury mattress, bedside table, ceiling fan, a chest of drawers, closet, and smart tv.SHARED BATHROOM The shared bathroom has a tub/shower combination and a single vanity.BEDROOM 3 The third bedroom has a Twin over (Twin) Trundle, a bedside table, a chest of drawers, a desk + chair, a closet, and smart tv.Washer + DryerYou will find a Washer and Dryer in the unit. We do provide detergent and dryer sheets for you to use!PROXIMITY TO NEARBY TOWNS, ATTRACTIONS, AND AIRPORTAirport:Fort Lauderdale- Hollywood International Airport: 12 MinutesDowntown Fort Lauderdale: 13 MinutesBreakfast, Brunch, Lunch, + DinnerThe Alchemist Café: 17 Minutes (Coffee, Tea, Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch)Tom Jenkins BBQ: 12 MinutesThe Foxy Brown: 16 Minutes (Comfort Food)Sea Watch on the Ocean: 23 Minutes (Seafood)Padrino's Cuban: 7 Minutes (Authentic Cuban)Outdoor Activities:SnorkelingScuba DivingPaddleboardingJet Skiing KayakingBoat ToursBrews + Libations

more description: A beautiful and spacious 1BR/1BA cottage set in a secluded, landscaped backyard. Opens out onto a patio for relaxed outdoor dining. 14 minutes from FLL airport. Right in the middle of the beach, Las Olas Blvd, Sawgrass Mills Mall, and Wilton Drive. Many restaurants nearby. Walk a few blocks to Milk Money, a trendy local coffee shop. Sunrise Blvd is two short blocks away for fast access to the beach, the airport, Wilton Manors, and Miami.  A large grocery store (Publix) is just two blocks away.The spaceTrue king-size, four post bed. (Some pictures show the old bed.)Fully equipped kitchenWifi: high speed AT&T internet, more than sufficient for video callsTV:  4K SmartTV in living room and bedroom, log on to your Netflix/HBO/etc accountCoffee:  Keurig coffee maker.  We provide 4 pods to get you started.Babies: every unit has a crib, and a highchair is available on request.Beach gear: we provide beach chairs, beach towels, umbrellas, and a cooler.Private washer and dryer inside the cottage.Private PatioGas Grill: You are welcome to clean it to your satisfaction and then to use it.  Most guests just heat it up to 400-500 degrees, brush it off a bit, and find that satisfactory.  If the gas runs out, let us know, and we will fill it the next morning (Sundays excepted)Also: desk, office chairThere is free, off-street parking right in front of the property.

more description: Eden Villas Miami is a hospitality group offering 37 villas and 10 yachts all over South Florida› Jardins d'Eden is a gorgeous villa located only 6 min away from the Beach and 5 min walk to a Shul› Experience a unique hand-picked decoration & furniture we had fun to design to create your best memories› Turfed Pool, BBQ, GarageFLL: 12 min MIA: 22minWynwood/Design District/Brickell: 22 minMiami Beach: 24 minJardins d'Eden is the perfect place for a family trip or friends get togetherThe spaceThis fully fenced property is yours for your private enjoyment.LIVING AREA› Modern, spacious organic living area designed with minimalist style of decoration. 60 inches Smart TV and high-Speed WiFi 300 Mbps.› Pool table› Dining table› Reading / Chill AreaKITCHEN: fully stocked kitchen with all top-of-the-line appliances and features. Coffee machine, toaster, blender, Ice maker, cookware, glassware, dishwasher, teapot, refrigerator, microwave, stove and oven. Direct opening to patio. BEDROOMS (3)Jardins d'Eden Villa sleeps 12 people in comfortable beds and 4 extras people on sleeper sofa and air mattress.› All bedrooms have tempur-pedic style mattresses, 600 thread count sheets, and plenty of pillows and blankets available. › Baby crib and premium air mattress provided on request. #1- Master bedroom with a full private bathroom, two queen beds, 2 large closets, 45-inch smart TV, a working desk and hotel luggage holders. #2- Two double Queen-size beds with walking closet. 45 inches smart TV and hotel luggage holders. #3-  Two double Queen-size beds with walking closet. 45 inches smart TV,   a working desk and hotel luggage holders. #- Living room pull out couch with a proper full mattress.› Air mattresses on request.BATHROOMS (2)All bathrooms are stocked with toiletries (shampoo and body wash), plush towels and a hairdryer.OUTDOOR SPACE › Large turfed pool› Lush topical landscaping, private outdoor patio with BBQ grill› 3 x custom made wood outdoor lounges› 1 x Custom made dining table and 3 bar stools› Hammock› The whole property is completely fenced-in for utmost privacy and security.›  2 - cars private garage

Perfect for family and friends getaway, our well-appointed 1 studio mix natural wood and stone with organic textures and state-of-the-art technology. You can expect a cozy vintage feel throughout. Kitchen comes equipped with all of your essentials, silverware, cooking utensils, pots, pans, baking sheet / pan, blender, crockpot... and of course wine glasses. The privacy fence in the back yard provides your very own outside space. Go ahead, enjoy a cookout on the back patio or a pleasant evening under the market lights with your favorite person. I’m confident you’ll love your stay or we will fix it.- Free Wi-Fi- Free parking (5 car maximum), 3 cars parking behind home back privacy fence, 2 car parking in front of home on street.

more description: Come enjoy our beautiful 3 Bedroom 2 full Bathroom home located just south of the Hard Rock Casino. Awesome location just 15 min to Dolphins Stadium and Fort Lauderdale Airport. Easy Access to Hollywood Beach or South to Miami. Driveway Parking. 1 King Bedroom with full private bath. 2 Queen bedrooms share a full bath. Couch converts to full bed to sleep 2. Washer and Dryer. High Speed Wifi. Landscaped backyard with patio. Outdoor seating and Lounge Chairs. Weekly Pool and Lawn Service.The spaceEnter to the living room space with large couch, accent chair and 65 inch curved flat screen TV. Two bedrooms on the left wing of the house include both queen beds and a full bath just outside. Private King bedroom and private full bath newly renovated on the right wing of the house. Full kitchen and additional couch that converts to a bed. Awesome pool and outdoor space. Sleeping space for additional person on living room couch.

description: ★BEACH CONDO/2 min WALK TO BEACH/POOL/HOT TUB/WIFI
name: Condo in Hollywood
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Silvana2 guests ·  · Studio ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in July 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Spacious and private Studio for a perfect romantic getaway, business travel or an affordable escape from the every day to relax, just a few steps away from dipping your toes in the sand at Hollywood Beach.Located at Costa Hollywood Resort, walking distance to Hollywood Broadwalk surrounded by bars, live music events, and restaurants from all over the world.Conveniently close to Downtown Hollywood, Aventura Mall, Gulfstream, Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino, Las Olas Boulevard and more.The spaceThis space features a king-sized bed, a private bath and work station. It has a room with a kitchenette, in-room coffee maker and mini-fridge. Enjoy this comfortable place with free Wi-Fi. Please, read at the end of the listing description about resort's fees.THE UNITThis 401sf unit features:- King Bed- Large bathroom with shower and hairdryer- Work station with desk and chair- Kitchenette with capsule coffee machine (Cagliari), microwave, toaster, dinnerware, silverware and mini-fridge - All linens, towels and toiletries are provided- Iron and ironing board- Balcony with small patio set- Pool/beach towels are provided by the condo- Beach umbrella at the room- Complimentary Wi‐ Fi Internet Access throughout the condo- Non-smoking room- Resorts fees ARE NOT included in Airbnb price. THE PROPERTYRESORT and PARKING FEES:- One time registration fee of $50/room (mandatory)- Resort fee from 1-30 days: $30 + tax/daily ($33.90 ) per room (mandatory)- Valet Parking fee $35 + tax/overnight, if you rent a car ($37.10 ). No self-parking available.Fees may be paid upon check-in.Enjoy access to the condo amenities:- A few steps to Hollywood beach access (2 minutes, literally)- Rooftop infinity pool and bar, sun deck and hot tub access- Poolside and two beach chairs/Loungers at the beach. - Beach umbrella in the room- Pool/Beach towels provided by the resort- Lounge areas with an amazing ocean and Intracoastal views- New brand gym- Wi-Fi throughout the property- 24/7 front desk and securityAsk for long term rental fees for more than 30 nights.No daily cleaning. You can request for extra cleaning service for an extra cost.

more description: Staying on a quiet palm lined street of Hollywood, Florida is the best possible way to let go of all the unnecessary stress of life. Spa and pool will help you relax. If you want beach or night life, just a short 10 minute ride is a beach and famous Hollywood boardwalk and only 5 minutes away is a Hollywood circle with cafes and restaurants. I will leave a few bottles of wine to help you relax.The spaceVery modern luxurious white and marble space with contemporary amenities, including a poker table. A perfect space to enjoy South Florida. A great backyard with pool and the jacuzzi spa, barbecue grill, TV, great places to relax surrounded by palm trees and tropical nature. 10 minutes drive from the beach and lively Hollywood Broadwalk.Note on hot tub: our hot tub does is not heated separately and hot tub temperatures will be the same as the main pool area, i.e. warm, not hot. Note of extra sleeping space (sofa-bed): comfortable for the average-sized person. Please plan accordingly.

description: Stylish, and Spacious 1 Bedroom Apt
name: Apartment in Lighthouse Point
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Mariano & Alexis4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in October 2019**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Enjoy a wonderful, spacious, and Stylush 1-bedroom apartment in the center of Lighthouse Point. This Beautiful city has been rated one of the top cities to live in Florida. From the beautiful beaches, the central locations close to Boca Raton and Fort Lauderdale, to the low traffic, top quality restaurants and Bars, this city will provide you with all of the perks from South Florida, while avoiding those few downsides like no parking, bumper to bumber traffic, and tourist packed beaches.The spaceOur beautiful apartment has been stylishly decorated  with the full needs and wants of our guest in mind. The living room is cozy and comfortable, perfect to unwind after a long day at the beach or running errands. The italian leather couch is perfect to put your fit up and relax as you enjoy our Smart TV equipped with internet Streaming services, and it is also easily turned into a comfortable queen size beds to fit the rest of the family or friends at night. The full kitchen is fully equipped to warm up left overs from the tasty nearby restaurants or cook out a full feast for your guests! The dining table sits 4 comfortably. The room has big closet space so you can keep the place tidy. The 12" pillow-top mattresses are some of the best mattresses you will sleep on, so good you won't want to get out of bed. Just like the living room, the bedroom also comes equipped with a Smart TV. The whole apartment is airy and sun-drench throughout the day, and the air conditioning will make sure you stay cool at all times. This beautiful apartment is perfect for all kinds of guest, from solo travelers, to couple's getaways, to family trips, everyone can enjoy themselves here!

more description:
Modern and Trendy, your going to love this Private Studio apartment in high end Victoria Park. Recently renovated with comfortable furniture, this place will be perfect to explore Fort Lauderdale. Fast access to FLL airport, freeways, tons of restaurants and night life, malls, coffee shops, grocery stores and the famous Flagler Art District. Your apartment is only 1.5 miles to the world famous Las Olas blvd and just under 2 miles to the beach!The space-SUPER HOST customer service! We have hosted over 3000 reservations so you can be confident that what you see is what you get!
-FREE PARKING (one space per reservation)
-Business or leisure, relax in our home that has all the amenities of yours
-Beautifully and professionally decorated with clean, modern touches
-Please review the sleeping arrangements. The only bed is a custom, comfortable sofa bed. 
-Lightning fast Wi-Fi 
-High-quality coffee maker
-Fully stocked kitchen includes pots, pans, plates, utensils, and appliances for easy cooking
-There is a connecting door to another apartment, however there is a dead bolt on both sides for the safety and privacy of all guests. 

We know that in these times, cleanliness is on everyone's minds, so rest assured that our place is clean, safe, and ready for your arrival!

more description: We are located between Miami and Fort Lauderdale. A short ride to famous Guitar Casino. About a 25 min walk from Hollywood beach boardwalk with restaurants, bars and famous Margaritaville Hotel with live music. Short walking distance is Young Circle, a street lined up on both sides with shops, restaurants & bars. Holland Park with an observation tower with beautiful views and a dock stretching along the intra-coastal by the end of our street. Hollywood Beach Golf Resorts is about 5 min walk.The spaceIf you are coming to attend an event or for work, we are about 8 minutes ride from Fort Lauderdale Airport. The studio  has an independent entrance at the front of the main house with keyless check-in. *This is a cozy and relaxing an-suite bedroom with a queen size bed, small desk with a dedicated printer with Wi-fi connection and Roku smart TV. Kitchenette with coffee pot, mini fridge and microwave. * THE HOSTS *David is gifted craftsman and general contractor from the west coast and Sol is Real Estate Broker Associate and Interior Designer by heart, originally from Brazil.Together they formed a terrific partnership flipping houses throughout South Florida until deciding to set their anchor in Hollywood Beach, after falling in love with the City vibe.  ** If you are on the market to purchase a property in South Florida, Sol can definitely help you find it, and if needed, David can get it ready for you! Message Sol in advance if that is your plan, and she will be happy to research the perfect properties to show you.

number of guests: 3 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in August 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: This large oceanfront hotel room in a resort setting features a king size bed and full bath, mini-fridge and microwave, fitness room, outdoor pool and spa/hot tub. Located right on the Broadwalk in Hollywood Beach. Just 5.9 mi from Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport. Newly renovated in 2014, this unobstructed ocean front spacious 273 sq ft. hotel room is situated right on the Hollywood Broadwalk. Read the your space section for parking options.The spaceThis oceanfront timeshare resort features a beach, outdoor pool and spa/hot tub. Located just 5.9 mi from Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport.Newly renovated in 2014, this unobstructed ocean front spacious 273 sq ft. hotel room is situated right on the Hollywood Broadwalk. Sleeps 3 with a king size bed and pull out chair bed suitable for a small child and offers a dining table with four chairs, full bathroom, mini-refrigerator, coffee maker, microwave, ironing board, safe, DVD player, cable TV and free WiFi. There is no daily maid service but mid-week towel exchange on Tuesdays and Thursdays is available from 10Am – 2pm on the pool deck.Guests can enjoy the resorts pool, hot tub, gym and game room. There is a DVD rental library and business center along with barbecue facilities.There is no need for a car while staying here, but if you arrive with a car, you can park behind the building at the private covered parking garage for $24 a day in and out. The city of Hollywood offers a weekly 24 hour permit parking in metered spaces only for approximately $22 a week. You would need to purchase from the city’s website and print the permit in advance prior to arriving.If you are not familiar with the Hollywood Broadwalk, it is a 2.5 mile long brick promenade, wide enough for bicycling, jogging, walking or sitting with plenty of room to spare. Studded with restaurants, cafes, bars and shops, all walk-able with that beautiful ocean view. Free concerts are offered most Fridays, Saturdays and Sundays and is a short walk at the Margaritaville band-shell right outside Margaritaville. The Water taxi stop is conveniently located on the intercostal, right outside the Landshark Restaurant and travels to Fort Lauderdale with hop on, hop off stops and most of the time offers alcohol beverages or you can BYOB. The resort is within 4 mi of West Lake Park, Eco Golf Club and Gulfstream Park Racetrack and Casino.

description: Private Salt Water Swiming Pool|3BD 2BA|4 miles to Fort Lauderdale Beach
name: Home in Fort Lauderdale
unit rental details: Entire home hosted by Kart8 guests ·  · 3 bedrooms ·  · 9 beds ·  · 2 baths
number of guests: 8 guests · **__** · 3 bedrooms · **__** · 9 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in August 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Fort Lauderdale, Florida, is known for a 24-mile span of glistening beaches and rolling Atlantic Ocean waves while set amongst the exotic Everglades. Whether you're looking for outdoor activities (land + water), unique dining, shopping, outdoor entertainment, or museums, there is something for everyone in this one-stop vacation destination.The spaceWe have designed this NEWLY RENOVATED home to have all of your essential needs!Boasting 1500 square feet of cozy living space, whether you're spending time with family or friends, this home will make you never want to leave  the town of Fort Lauderdale.PETS:Pet fee is 300$ and We do accept pets with prior approval. Please note if you’re interested in bringing your pet in the initial message. If you’re away from the home, please crate your pet. The area is pet-friendly, so you will find plenty of places to let Fido join you.You MUST receive prior approval for pets, otherwise you will be charged a $300 penalty.We accept a maximum of two dogs at our short-term rental. If away from the home, we ask that your pet be crated. The area is quite dog friendly; therefore, there are many places to bring Fido.If there are any damages from dogs, service animals, or emotional support animals, we impose an additional $150 cleaning fee.HOME LAYOUTFollow along- when entering the front door, you will walk into the open concept living room, dining area, and kitchen. LIVING ROOMSink into the luxurious sofa after a long adventurous day by watching a movie/show on our SMART  65" TV. You will have access to the guest Roku and Netflix accounts. If you would like to access your streaming services, just remember your passwords!!KITCHENFully stocked with all of the kitchen necessities you need to prepare a great meal at home. You will find a stovetop, oven, and full-size refrigerator to fix meals for large groups. Visit a local farmers market or grocery store and then enjoy preparing a delectable meal. If dining out, there are many excellent local restaurants in the area, or get take-out and enjoy it on the back patio under the stars or in the dining room.+Coffee Maker, coffee, tea, sugar, sugar substitutes, and creamer. +Toaster, Baking Sheets, Basic Seasonings.DINING ROOMThe dining room table is outfitted with a table fit for six and additional seating at the bar.BEDROOM 1The "main bedroom" is outfitted with a king bed, luxury mattress, two bedside tables, a ceiling fan, bedside lamps, a dresser, a chest, a closet, and a smart tv.MAIN BATHROOMThe main bathroom has a walk-in shower (with a small lip) and vanity, located directly off the main bedroom.BEDROOM 2The second bedroom is equipped with a queen-sized bed, luxury mattress, bedside table, ceiling fan, a chest of drawers, closet, and smart tv.SHARED BATHROOM The shared bathroom has a tub/shower combination and a single vanity.BEDROOM 3 The third bedroom has a Twin over (Twin) Trundle, a bedside table, a chest of drawers, a desk + chair, a closet, and smart tv.Washer + DryerYou will find a Washer and Dryer in the unit. We do provide detergent and dryer sheets for you to use!PROXIMITY TO NEARBY TOWNS, ATTRACTIONS, AND AIRPORTAirport:Fort Lauderdale- Hollywood International Airport: 12 MinutesDowntown Fort Lauderdale: 13 MinutesBreakfast, Brunch, Lunch, + DinnerThe Alchemist Café: 17 Minutes (Coffee, Tea, Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch)Tom Jenkins BBQ: 12 MinutesThe Foxy Brown: 16 Minutes (Comfort Food)Sea Watch on the Ocean: 23 Minutes (Seafood)Padrino's Cuban: 7 Minutes (Authentic Cuban)Outdoor Activities:SnorkelingScuba DivingPaddleboardingJet Skiing KayakingBoat ToursBrews + Libations

more description: Newly renovated top to bottom - lofted BR apt has everything you need for a cozy vacation - steps away from the ocean. In this apt you will find everything you need! We provide a fully stocked kitchen, beautiful modern aqua accents and super comfortable queen size beds. We have a sofa, 40 inch tv and large bathrooms. The buildings has 8 Units - all available for vacation rentals. Each having its own super cool modern charm.✨ Highlights✓ Steps away from the ocean✓ Fully stocked kitchenThe spaceYou will love this beautifully furnished modern lofted apartment. It has a  living room, mini kitchen with stovetop and mini  fridge, and a queen size bed lofted above in a upstairs room with a full dresser and mirror. Approx 400 sq ft divided between 2 levels. The furnishings are modern ocean  inspired hues of aqua and grey for a zen like relaxing retreat.  It has 1 large bathroom with tub. Our place is seconds away from beach, parks, cafes and shopping. Beautiful beach offers lots of oceanfront dining, cycling, bike rentals , beach activities and the broad walk. We can offer kid/baby items such as crib, toys, and high chair at no extra cost. Also also we have beach chairs and towels  for you to use on the beach. Please just let us know ahead of time, and we will be happy to accommodate any need you may have to make your stay comfortable. We have small shampoo and soaps to get you started and offer a small stocked coffee bar. There is a small washer and dryer in the back of the building , for guest use stocked with detergent and such as you need.Bedroom 1 - 1 queen bedCommon space - 1 floor mattress

more description:
This comfortable 350 sq. ft. casita is located in a quiet, small community of just 7 units with beautiful foliage and greenery.  It’s cheery and welcoming interior invites you to begin your South Florida vacation in style! The kitchen has stainless steel appliances and plenty of cabinets. Table w/2 stools. Enjoy fast WiFi and Sling streaming service. A large park is just across the street. The award-winning beach is just one mile away. Pets welcome w/fee.The spaceFor your convenience and security, the front door has been outfitted with a Smart Lock. Never fumble with bulky keys again! 

This 350 sq ft studio property offers a queen-size bed, small table and two stools and a kitchenette with full-size stainless steel appliances. There is plenty of counter space to prepare a snack or a simple meal. The bath features a large vanity and a corner walk-in shower. 

Come to south Florida for outstanding beaches, sunny skies and delicious cuisine. There’s something new to love every day here!

This property is dog-friendly with an additional $250 fee per pet. Please let us know if you will be bringing your dog. (only dogs are permitted, sorry)

Enjoy the infinity pool's water views, the wonderful panorama of the expansive coastline, coffee shops, rooftop bars, restaurants, or a relaxing evening in the hot tub.The spaceOur two-bedroom, one-bathroom condo offers contemporary decor and upscale amenities in a prime Hollywood location. This fully furnished suite come with a leather couch and chairs, a comfortable king size bed, and modern-designed kitchen cabinetry and appliances. It is also located just steps from the Atlantic Ocean and the famous Hollywood Beach Boardwalk. The unit has a dishwasher as well as a washer and dryer. It also comes with high-end appliances, high-speed WiFi, quartz countertops in the kitchen and bathroom, floor-to-ceiling hurricane impact-resistant sliding glass doors in the living room and bedroom, and flat-screen TVs in the bedrooms and living room.Enjoy all luxury amenities at Costa Hollywood: an infinity-edged swimming pool with sun deck, fitness facility, rooftop bar & lounge, restaurant, coffee shop, picnic area, a vehicle wash area, valet parking, and more on-site! name: Apartment in Hollywood
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Lucie3 guests ·  · Studio ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 3 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in September 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
Right in front of the Boardwalk with the Biggest pool ever!  The studio is located in the Hollywood Beach Resort. Go back in time as you enter its hundred-year-old lobby, take a trip in the elevator, and waltz into our quaint studio. You’ll find a comfy king-size bed, a sofabed, a kitchenette sporting your cooking basics, a bathroom kitted out with shampoo, and towels as well as all the essentials needed to stay sanitary. We supply an umbrella and chairs so you don’t need to pay fees at the beach. Bars, restaurants, tons of jet ski rentals, and of course, the wonderful blue sea steps away.  Downtown Hollywood is 7 minutes away by car.  Get on I-95 S and in 45 minutes you will be in  South Beach, Brickell, Mimo district, and Wynwood.  
If you have questions our team works round the clock to ensure the best vacation experience ever!

Please be advised that we require our guests to complete a pre-check-in form and pay a refundable $50 deposit fee via a third-party application called Duve. This is where we provide all the important details that you must know during your stay, such as check-in instructions, full address, WIFI and so much more. Thank you!The space✅1 king bed 
✅1 sofabed

GENERAL
✅Unlimited WI-FI
✅Smart TV
✅Beach Basics: chairs, umbrellas, and towels
✅Linens/towels
✅Shampoo and soap
✅Keypad lock
✅Pack 'n play (per request)
✅Cooler (per request)

▶️(Please keep in mind that we only provide initial supplies)

Furnished and equipped kitchen with cleaning and cooking essentials including:
✅ Microwave
✅ 4 burner stove 
✅ Toaster
✅ Cooking utensils
✅ Flatware and crockery

Our unit is ideal for you and your fellow vacationers. Decorated with Love and Care, every detail is designed for your comfort.

more description: Relaxing 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom pool home.  Enjoy being a 10 minutes drive to the beach while sleeping in the calm, residential neighborhood of Hollywood Lakes.The spaceWe have new protocols which we must follow due to covid-19. Please read them below before booking.- We are now required to have a record of every guest’s legal name and where they are from, for contact tracing purposes.-The maximum number of guests is 8- No unregistered guests can be at the property (inside or outside) at any time..- Any reservation violating local covid-19 guidelines such as gatherings and parties will be immediately canceled without a refund.We are legally obligated to abide by these rules as per state laws until further notice.Beautiful and renovated 4 bedroom house with 2 bathrooms located in the prestigious Hollywood Lakes. Enjoy your morning coffee or evening cocktail by the pool. Perfect location for friends and families. Spend some quality time in a residential neighborhood located an 8-10 minute drive to Hollywood beach. Parking for 3 cars maximum.The house has:- Open living, dining kitchen area with a 65" smart TV in the living room- Fully stocked kitchen- Master bedroom with king bed, en-suite bathroom and a 50" smart TV- Bedroom 2 has a queen bed and a 32" smart TV- Bedroom 3 has a king bed and a 50" smart TV- Bedroom 4 has a queen bed and a 32" smart TV- Backyard with BBQ, seating, dining, pool and spa (spa has no blower)- Laundry room - outside next to the outdoor dining- 2 bathrooms (one with tub, one with shower)Absolutely no parties or drugs on the property. Absolutely no smoking inside the property.This house is equipped with Minut decibel detectors and no parties will be tolerated. This is a residential neighborhood, please be respectful of the neighbors.1,557 square feet home

Private, fully fenced yard with patio, picnic table, and gas grill. Wifi: redundant high speed connectionsParking: free, off-street, two carsTV:  4K SmartTV, log on to your Netflix/HBO/etc accountCoffee:  Keurig coffee maker.  We provide 4 pods to get you started.Also:  crib, beach gear, washer & dryer, fully equipped kitchenThe spaceIt is a 1.2 mile walk to the beach. Unit has a private gas grillParking is not assigned, but there is plenty of room for two cars.Wi-Fi: two internet connections (AT&T and Comcast) provide redundancy. Both are the highest residential speeds available.  Wifi is strong throughout the entire property, Stream 4K movies or do video calls. Kitchen: The Kitchen is equipped for real cooking. There are sharp knives and non-stick pots and pans.  Beach gear: we provide beach towels, beach chairs, umbrellas, and a cooler.Laundry:  You'll have access to the laundry room. more description: HEATED POOL INCLUDED IN THE PRICE!*Driveway holds max 3 cars. All other will be towed by the city. Unfortunately we have no control of this!*Experience Hollywood, FL, by visiting this elegant and spacious home nestled right in the heart of the city only 2 miles away from the beach and boardwalk. Explore numerous attractions and Miami with ease.An abundance of luxurious amenities awaits your arrival!The space✔ 4 Comfortable BRs✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen✔ Private Swimming Pool✔ Sun Lounges✔ BBQ✔ Foosball Table✔ Smart TVs with RokuA blend of comfort, luxury, style, and convenience greets you as soon as you step inside. While decorating this inviting retreat, we worked hard to create a feeling of home away from home for you. The living area is designed as an open concept space, successfully combining a modern living room, a cozy dining area, a lounge with a foosball table, and a fully equipped kitchen. Large backyard doors allow for plenty of natural light to illuminate the space throughout the day. Together with the bright tiled floors, it creates an elegant ambiance.★ LIVING ROOM ★Sit-back in this relaxing and comfy area, enjoy your favorite TV show, listen to some music, and have fun with your family and friends.✔ Huge Sectional Sofa with Pillows✔ Smart TV with Roku for Streaming Services (Netflix, Hulu, Prime, etc.)✔ Wooden Coffee Table✔ Stylish Reading Lamps★ LOUNGE ★Sit by the glass doors leading to the backyard and enjoy the comfortable lounge. Grab a friend and play a game of foosball.✔ Lounge with a Table and Comfy Chairs✔ Foosball Table✔ Access to the Pool Area★ KITCHEN & DINING ★Make delicious meals for your family and friends in this fully equipped kitchen with plenty of counter space. Start your day with a cup of fresh coffee on the covered backyard patio for an unforgettable experience✔ Microwave✔ Stove✔ Oven✔ Refrigerator/Freezer with Water/Ice Dispenser✔ Coffee Maker✔ Complimentary Coffee + Pods✔ Kettle✔ Dishwasher✔ Sink - Hot & Cold Water✔ Trays✔ Glasses✔ Silverware✔ Pots & PansThere is a small breakfast table and a more formal dining table. Both are conveniently placed next to the kitchen so that you can serve your tasty delicacies without having to move too far.✔ Breakfast Table with Seating for 4✔ Dining Table with Seating for 6✔ Kitchen Bar Overlooking the Lounge★ SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS – 4 BEDROOMS ★The house is furnished to accommodate up to eight guests in its four highly comfortable bedrooms. Retreat to recharge after a day of exploring and adventuring in sunny Hollywood, Florida!♛ Master Bedroom✔ King-Size Bed with Pillows, Linen, and Sheets✔ 40" Smart TV with Roku for Streaming Services✔ Closets✔ Cabinet with Spacious Drawers✔ Night Stands with Reading Lamps✔ Ensuite Bathroom with a Shower♛ Bedroom 2, 3 & 4✔ Queen-Size Bed with Pillows, Linen, and Sheets✔ 40" Smart TV with Roku for Streaming Services✔ Closets✔ Cabinet with Spacious Drawers✔ Night Stands with Reading Lamps★ BATHROOMS ★The master bedroom offers direct access to its private bathroom. The home features an additional full bathroom, which can be entered from its central area.✔ Bath Tub with a Shower✔ Shower Cabin✔ Vanity✔ Mirror✔ Toilet✔ Towels✔ Essential Toiletries★ OUTDOOR AREA + COVERED PATIO LOUNGE ★Your private outdoor haven offers a covered area where you can enjoy the cool shade after a dip in the spacious swimming pool. The backyard is furnished with comfy lounges and seating areas for those moments when you don't want to go to the beach to relax.✔ Swimming Pool✔ Sun Lounges✔ Propane BBQ Grill✔ Covered Dining Area with Seating for 8✔ Covered Lounge with Sectional and a Coffee TableThe house is exclusively yours, without unnecessary interruptions for the duration of your stay, so relax, unwind, and make yourself at home. Other than the above-mentioned amenities, our home is also equipped with:✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi✔ Air Conditioning✔ Heating✔ Laundry room with Washer/Dryer (detergent supplied)✔ Free Private Parking (2-3 vehicles at the driveway)✔ Security (patrolling the neighborhood)✔ Pack n play + Highchair (upon request)

more description: Newly renovated top to bottom - lofted BR apt has everything you need for a cozy vacation - steps away from the ocean. In this apt you will find everything you need! We provide a fully stocked kitchen, beautiful modern aqua accents and super comfortable queen size beds. We have a sofa, 40 inch tv and large bathrooms. The buildings has 8 Units - all available for vacation rentals. Each having its own super cool modern charm.✨ Highlights✓ Steps away from the ocean✓ Fully stocked kitchenThe spaceYou will love this beautifully furnished modern lofted apartment. It has a  living room, mini kitchen with stovetop and mini  fridge, and a queen size bed lofted above in a upstairs room with a full dresser and mirror. Approx 400 sq ft divided between 2 levels. The furnishings are modern ocean  inspired hues of aqua and grey for a zen like relaxing retreat.  It has 1 large bathroom with tub. Our place is seconds away from beach, parks, cafes and shopping. Beautiful beach offers lots of oceanfront dining, cycling, bike rentals , beach activities and the broad walk. We can offer kid/baby items such as crib, toys, and high chair at no extra cost. Also also we have beach chairs and towels  for you to use on the beach. Please just let us know ahead of time, and we will be happy to accommodate any need you may have to make your stay comfortable. We have small shampoo and soaps to get you started and offer a small stocked coffee bar. There is a small washer and dryer in the back of the building , for guest use stocked with detergent and such as you need.Bedroom 1 - 1 queen bedCommon space - 1 floor mattress

more description: Steps from the legendary HOLLYWOOD BOARDWALK overlooking a beautiful beach surrounded by bars, live music events, and wonderful restaurants - All at walking distance. This MODERN CONDO RESORT with a ROOFTOP INFINITY POOL, Gym, Hot Tub and Sun Deck fulfills your dream of an amazing vacation. Master room with a King-Sized Bed, Living Room with 1 Comfortable Full Pullout Sofa Bed and BALCONY. No car needed.Resort fee will be charged at the check-in time at the property and it is not included.The spaceBRAND NEW Apartment with all the comfort that you need to feel at home, a PERFECT STAYCATION for family and friends. Our well-designed bedrooms mix natural wood and stone with organic textures, along with state-of-the-art technology. The fully- equipped Gourmet kitchen offers a stainless steel refrigerator, a microwave, dishes,  one coffee maker, and a toaster . Spacious bedroom with a hairdryer, one iron/ironing board, and TVs.Walking distance to numerous highly-rated Restaurants, Broadwalk, and Playground. Rooftop Infinity Pool and Lounge Area offer amazing ocean and Intracoastal views.Fully furnished, ceramic floors, electronic door locks, European-style cabinetry, modern-style designer fixtures, and faucets.Enjoy a very luxurious stay for 4 guests.LOCATION: Steps from the legendary HOLLYWOOD BEACH BROADWALK. BEDROOMS: This home accommodates 4 guests. Check the bed count below:● Bedroom 1: King Bed (for 2)● Living Room: 1 Full Pull Out Sofa Bed  (for 2)Bathroom ADA with toiletries (shampoo, conditioner, and body wash), towels and a hairdryer.CHECK-IN & CHECK-OUT: You can check-in at any time after 4PM, and you are also allowed to check-out at any time before 11AM. An early check-in or late check-out time may be available, but you should inquire before your arrival.

description: The Nook Hollywood | Few steps away from the Beach | Pool and Free Parking!
name: Apartment in Hollywood
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Andrea4 guests ·  · Studio ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in March 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: 👪Create beautiful memories with your group that will last a lifetime. The Nook lives in a secluded spot just a few minutes drive from the Hollywood Beach Broadwalk. It’s situated on an island only accessible via bridge/drawbridge, resting between the Intracoastal and the great Atlantic. Take 20 steps (I’ve literally counted) and you’ll find yourself embraced by the roaring sound of the tide’s eternal movements. 🏠 This spacious and comfortable one-level studio is decorated with everything you require for a perfect getaway by the sea, equipped with all the essentials needed for a simple, carefree vacation. PARK FOR FREE, ascend the patio and waltz into our quaint studio where you’ll find two snug full-size beds, a bathroom kitted out with shampoo and towels, and a Fully Equipped Kitchen sporting your cooking basics just in case you feel like making dinner at home.🏖️ We supply an umbrella and chairs so you don’t need to pay fees at the beach. Enjoy our Barbecue space while you relax beneath the stars or sunshine. Walk to Tiki Tiki for dinner or take a short drive down the road to Le Tub for a water-side burger. Amongst various walkable marinas rent catermerangs, jet skis, sailboats, scooters, and much more. Take a 17 minute drive and you’ll reach Fort Lauderdale Beach known for its nightlife. If you have questions our team works round the clock to ensure the best vacation experience ever!The space✅2 comfortable full bedsOUTDOOR LIVING: ✅furnished outside patio w/ seating areas.INDOOR LIVING:  ✅Flat-screen TVs ✅ Modern decor.KITCHEN: ✅All new appliances ✅Full-size kitchen and refrigerator✅ Coffee maker✅Toaster✅Tea pot✅Microwave and oven.GENERAL:✅Free WiFi✅Central A/C✅Linens/towels✅Shampoo and soap✅Keypad lock✅Pack 'n play (per request)✅Cooler (per request)▶️Please keep in mind that we only provide initial supplies❌No smoking❌No pets❌No parties or events▶️Check-in is any time after 4 PM

name: Apartment in Fort Lauderdale

number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in November 2012**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Thoroughly residential neighborhood, 0.6 mile walk to Wilton Drive. Parking for one car only. Window AC unit. Furnished like a hotel room, just a bedroom and a bathroom. Private entrance, you get the whole apartment to yourself. Microwave, coffee maker, toaster & mini-fridge.No KitchenNo Dryer or WasherCoffee: Keurig, and we provide the first 4 podsWifi: redundant high speed connections4K SmartTV, log on to your Netflix/HBO/etc accountParking: free, off-street, one carCrib, Beach gearThe spaceCooking: there is no kitchen, there is a Microwave, coffee maker, toaster & mini-fridge. Wi-Fi: two internet connections (Comcast and AT&T) provide redundancy. Both are the highest residential speeds available.  Wifi is strong throughout the entire property. Stream 4K movies or do video calls.Laundry: There is no washer or dryerParking: assigned parking for one car in front of the building.  The nearest parking for a second car is 6 blocks away (0.4 miles).Babies: every unit has a Pack n Play CribBeach gear: we provide beach towels, beach chairs, umbrellas, and a cooler.Grill (Shared gas grill): The grill in the backyard is shared by seven units. You are welcome to clean it to your satisfaction and then to use it.  Most guests just heat it up to 400-500 degrees, brush it off a bit, and find that satisfactory.  If the gas runs out, let us know, and we will fill it the next morning (Sundays excepted). Shared Picnic TableShared Backyard**At some time after August 8th, 2022, we will add outdoor security cameras covering the parking area and the two gates to the interior courtyard.

more description: A nicely decorated economical choice in Oakland Park near Ft. Lauderdale! - 5 miles from the famous Ft. Lauderdale beaches, clubs & popular attractions- A practical place to stay that’s centrally located & easy access to fun- A great option for couples or friends traveling on a budget- Free parking space, laundry facilities & shared pool onsite- Please read the important note belowThe spaceThis one-bedroom apartment features:- a queen-sized bed in the bedroom w/a good-sized closet- lovely mixed hardwood floors throughout the place- a spacious and comfortable living room area for relaxing when at home plus a Smart TV- a cute half-table nook to seat 2 for a sit-down meal- a fully-equipped kitchen with all you’ll need to prepare meals at home, especially great if vacationing on a budget!Plus! - A shared outdoor pool - shared laundry facilities on-site- free parking space- security systemPlease note that this apartment is not in the main tourist hotspot but you'll be just a 15-minute drive away from the famous Ft. Lauderdale beaches and beach clubs, LAS OLAS Boulevard — the main thoroughfare with everything from fashion boutiques and art galleries, to memorable restaurants, sidewalk cafes and bars like TOMMY BAHAMA MARLIN BAR, the Ft. Lauderdale RIVERWALK — a 2.5-mile stretch of brick walkway and gardens connects the Arts & Entertainment District to the commercial core of downtown. You’ll find plenty of events and activities, art displays, outdoor dining and more. Plus Ft. Lauderdale is known for its nightclubs/and discos and late-night party fun — you’ll be just a 15-min ride away from it all! It's also a good option for the long-term stay or remote worker as well. You'll vacation like you live here!

more description: This is a home with a hostel vibe. Private bedrooms. There are 6 rooms in total. Common areas (including bathrooms) are shared with other guests. - Comfy Queen Bed- Black Out Curtains - Modern New Decor - Smart Roku TV- Self Check-in- Fast Wifi- No curfew- Central A/C- Ceiling Fan - Free Parking- Full kitchen- Lock- Bath Essentials & towels- Dresser- Hot showers- Fenced Yard - Covered Patio - Iron- Hair dryer - Professionally cleanedThe spaceWhat makes our place so unique is the environment; it's a combination of a boutique hostel and a home stay. You can expect to meet interesting and cool people from all over the world. We have hosted people from all continents. However it's more private than a typical hostel since all the guest rooms are private, so it's also possible to just rest and keep it to yourself, if that's what you are looking for.Our amenities include (but are not limited to)KITCHEN-  Cook top, oven, microwave- Fridge & Freezer- Coffee maker- Dishes & Silverware- Pots & pansBATHROOMS (2 bathrooms, shared with 4 other rooms)- Towels , Wash Clothes & Bath Mat- Hand soap - Toilet Paper & Hot WaterBEDROOM (private)- Queen size bed, Spring Mattress- Sheets & pillows - Smart TV (no cable)- Dresser- Lock & KeyOUTSIDE AREAS- Smoking area- Hanging out area- Patio chairsOTHER- Central Air Conditioning: the same unit for the whole house, the temperature is typically kept at 74 at night time, guests can't control it themselves (it's an automatic programmable thermostat) - Free Wifi in the house for your convenience - Cleaning: Our dedicated cleaning crew comes frequently to clean all the common areas, and the guest rooms are deep cleaned before every check-in. We don't provide housekeeping during the stay, but clean linens and towels are always available when requested

name: Townhouse in Hollywood
unit rental details: Entire townhouse hosted by Newman Hospitality4 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in April 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
This bright and comfortable 2 bedroom/1 bath casita is located in quiet, small community of just 7 units and beautiful foliage and greenery.  It’s cheery and welcoming interior invites you to begin your South Florida vacation in style! The kitchen is fully equipped with stainless steel appliances and plenty of cabinets. Enjoy fast WiFi and Sling streaming service. Primary BR w/ Smart TV. A large park is just across the street. The award-winning beach is just one mile away. Pets welcome w/fee.The spaceFor your convenience and security, the front door has been outfitted with a Smart Lock. No more bulky keys to lug around and fumble with! 

The living space here is minimalist-style. A table and four cozy chairs create a common gathering area. 

The well-equipped kitchenette boasts full-size stainless steel appliances with plenty of cabinets for storage. The counter space is perfect for preparing snacks and simple meals. 

The first bedroom is clean and fresh, with queen size bed and a flat-screen TV outfitted with Sling streaming service. The second bedroom offers a double bed, with two nightstands and lamps and a double closet. 

The spacious bath features a tub/shower with a rain showerhead and modern vanity. Bathroom toiletries are provided. The stack washer/dryer is also found here. 

Due to condensation from the mini-split ACs, it is completely normal for the paint and wallpaper to sometimes puff up.

more description:
Step into the comfort of this Luxurious, 4 Bedroom vacation rental!

Beautiful wide water view of Northlake, enjoy Florida´s incredible sunsets at your Private dock with ocean access. Looking for a perfect space to share a wonderful time with your family? Our totally remodeled, open floor plan with a fully equipped chef's gas kitchen and granite island with a new french door refrigerator will provide you with an area designed for your family to cook, dine and enjoy.

Our Built-in office is just the right place for home working during your vacation and of course, you have to love our Hollywood Beach weather in your fantastic pool surrounded by lushly landscaped for maximum privacy and comfort. 

Situated in a serene residential area, the home promises an urban retreat close to the best restaurants, stores and stunning beaches.
Imagine renting a kayak or a canoe and meandering down Stranahan River for hours, stopping off at little inlets through an incredible, mangrove-filled park.

Every detail is designed thinking of the Best Vacation Experience!The spaceSpacious and fully outfitted with everything you need, this house ensures that you and your whole family enjoy an easygoing getaway by the ocean.

Sleeping Accommodations:
✅Master Bedroom 1: 1 King Bed 
✅Bedroom 2: Sofa Bed (convertible to a queen-size bed)
✅Bedroom 3: 1 Queen bed and 1 Twin bed

description: 2BR/1BA in Hlywd, WiFi, Pets OK, Close to Beach, 24. Hour Pro-Host Support
name: Townhouse in Hollywood
unit rental details: Entire townhouse hosted by Newman Hospitality4 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in April 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
This bright and comfortable 2 bedroom/1 bath casita is located in quiet, small community of just 7 units and beautiful foliage and greenery.  It’s cheery and welcoming interior invites you to begin your South Florida vacation in style! The kitchen is fully equipped with stainless steel appliances and plenty of cabinets. Enjoy fast WiFi and Sling streaming service. Primary BR w/ Smart TV. A large park is just across the street. The award-winning beach is just one mile away. Pets welcome w/fee.The spaceFor your convenience and security, the front door has been outfitted with a Smart Lock. No more bulky keys to lug around and fumble with! 

The living space here is minimalist-style. A table and four cozy chairs create a common gathering area. 

The well-equipped kitchenette boasts full-size stainless steel appliances with plenty of cabinets for storage. The counter space is perfect for preparing snacks and simple meals. 

The first bedroom is clean and fresh, with queen size bed and a flat-screen TV outfitted with Sling streaming service. The second bedroom offers a double bed, with two nightstands and lamps and a double closet. 

The spacious bath features a tub/shower with a rain showerhead and modern vanity. Bathroom toiletries are provided. The stack washer/dryer is also found here. 

Due to condensation from the mini-split ACs, it is completely normal for the paint and wallpaper to sometimes puff up.

description: Beautiful Studio/Bath, Hallandale Beach, Outdoor Pool, walking distance to the beach & free parking!
name: Apartment in Hallandale Beach
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Corina4 guests ·  · Studio ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · Studio · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in May 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Perfect location in the Heart of Hallandale Beach a 14-minute walk across the drawbridge to the Ocean! The studio is located inside a vintage motel reminiscent of an old Miami era. It is equipped with everything you need for a simple, carefree vacation. As you waltz into our quaint studio you’ll find two comfy full-size beds, a kitchenette sporting your cooking basics, a bathroom kitted out with shampoo, and towels as well as all the essentials needed to stay sanitary. We supply an umbrella and chairs so you don’t need to pay fees at the beach. Free parking and outdoor pool! If you enjoy a game of blackjack, like to bet on horse racing, or fancy night out at a sports bar head 6 minutes down the road to S. Florida’s renowned Gulfstream Mall and Casino. Starbucks, Walmart, and Publix are located next door. South Beach, is a scenic 34-minute ride with plenty of water views down Ocean Drive. If you have questions our team works round the clock to ensure the best vacation experience ever!The space- 2 Full-sized bed- Private bathroom- Kitchenette with basic cookware- TV with ROKU- Unlimited Wi-FiGENERAL- Beach Basics: chairs, umbrellas and towels- Linens/towels- Shampoo and soap- Keypad lock- Pack 'n play (per request)▶️(Please keep in mind that we only provide initial supplies)All furnished and fully equipped with cleaning and cooking essentials including:- Microwave- Portable electric stove- Toaster- Cooking utensils- Flatware and crockeryThis incredible home is ideal for you and your fellow vacationers. Decorated with Love and Care, every detail is designed for your comfort. - No smoking- No pets- No parties or events▶️Please check the house rules!We are located in the knights inn hotel, common areas of the building are shared and under the buildings management responsibility. Any questions related to the apartment, please let us know. We are happy to help you!

more description: Steps from the legendary HOLLYWOOD BOARDWALK overlooking a beautiful beach surrounded by bars, live music events, and wonderful restaurants - All at walking distance. This MODERN CONDO RESORT with a ROOFTOP INFINITY POOL, Hot Tub, Gym and Sun Deck fulfills your dream of an amazing vacation. Studio with a King-Sized Bed and BALCONY. No car needed.Resort fee will be charged at the check-in time at the property and it is not included.The spaceBRAND NEW Apartment with all the comfort that you need to feel at home, a PERFECT STAYCATION for family and friends. Our well-designed 1 Studio mixes natural wood and stone with organic textures, along with state-of-the-art technology. The Studio offers a stainless steel refrigerator, a microwave, dishes, one coffee maker, and a toaster. Spacious bedroom with a hairdryer, an electronic safe within the suite, one iron/ironing board, and TVs.Bathroom is stocked with toiletries (shampoo, conditioner, and body wash), towels and a hairdryer.Walking distance to numerous highly-rated Restaurants, Boardwalk, and Playground. Rooftop infinity pool and lounge area offer amazing ocean and Intracoastal views.Fully furnished, ceramic floors, electronic door locks, European-style cabinetry, modern-style designer fixtures, and faucets. Enjoy a very luxurious stay for 2 guests.LOCATION: Steps from the legendary HOLLYWOOD BEACH BROADWALK. CHECK-IN & CHECK-OUT: You can check-in at any time after 4PM, and you are also allowed to check-out at any time before 11AM. An early check-in or late check-out time may be available, but you should inquire first.

more description: This is a home with a hostel vibe. Private bedrooms. There are 5 rooms in total. Common areas (including bathroom) are shared with other guests.- Private A/C- Private door to back yard- Queen size Bed- Blackout Curtains- Smart Roku TV- Self Check-in- Wifi- No curfew- Private A/C- Parking for 1 car- Full kitchen- Secure Room with Key and Lock- Bath Essentials & towels- Closet space- FLL Airport: 6 miles- Las Olas Beach: 6 miles- Downtown:4milesThe spaceWhat makes our place so unique is the environment; it's a combination of a boutique hostel and a home stay. You can expect to meet interesting and cool people from all over the world. We have hosted people from all continents. However it's more private than a typical hostel since all the guest rooms are private, so it's also possible to just rest and keep it to yourself, if that's what you are looking for.Our amenities include (but are not limited to)KITCHEN-  Cook top, oven, microwave- Fridge & Freezer- Coffee maker- Dishes & Silverware- Pots & pansBATHROOM (shared)- Towels , Wash Clothes & Bath Mat- Hand soap & Body soap- Shampoo & Conditioner- Toilet Paper & Hot WaterBEDROOM (private)- Queen size bed- Memory Foam Mattress- Sheets & pillows - Smart TV (no cable)- Closet & Hangers- Lock & Key- Black-out curtainsOTHER- Free Wifi in the house for your convenience - Cleaning: Our dedicated cleaning crew comes once a day to clean all the common areas, the guest rooms are deep cleaned before every check-in. We don't provide house keeping in the room during the stay, but clean linens and towels are always available when requested
